198b1(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag thams cad dang lhan cig tu med med kyi bu'i mdog dang / rtags dang / gzugs dang / dbyibs dang / spyod lam dang / ma byad du bdag nyid mngon par sprul nas bcom/
198b2(mdo sde): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes dpal brtsegs rgyal po'i zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ de nas chas te/ yud tsam gcig gis sangs rgyas kyi
198b3(mdo sde): zhing mi mjed der phyin to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed 'dir de dag phyin pa tsam gyi mod la sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed thams cad du / bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir ka 'dzam bu'i nu bo
198b4(mdo sde): gser gyi char pa mngon par rab tu phab bo// de dag gling bzhi pa bar ma 'di ga la ba dang / yul ma ga d+ha'i zhing ga la ba de logs su dong ste/ dong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i zhabs gnyis la mdo
198b5(mdo sde): bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcog tu 'khod do// bcom ldan 'das ning dung yang rgyal po gzugs can snying po dang thabs gcig chos kyis gnas pa'i gtam rab tu mdzad do// yang de'i tshe byang phyogs na sangs
198b6(mdo sde): rgyas zhing gang+gA'i klung brgyad cu'i bye ma snyed 'das pa de na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing spos thams cad yang dag par 'phags pa zhes bya ba yod de// sangs rgyas kyi zhing sngags ma lnga dang ldan par gnas
198b7(mdo sde): bde na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal me tog gi snying po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to// 'khor der byang chub sems
199a1(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po zhes bya ba chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dus par gyur te 'dug go// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying pos/
199a2(mdo sde): steng gi nam mkha' la bltas so// des kyang der nam mkha' la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs med dpag tu med pa byang phyogs kyi phyogs cha nas/ lho phyogs su 'dong ba mthong bar gyur to// des
199a3(mdo sde): lho phyogs su rnam par bltas te snang ba chen po mthong nas/ des de bzhin gshegs pa dpal me tog gi sdong po ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba rab tu btud nas 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan/
199a4(mdo sde): 'das bdag ting nge 'dzin gyi rnal 'byor las langs nas ring po ma lags te/ bdag gos ni steng gi nam mkha' la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs ma mchis// dpag tu ma mchis pa byang phyos
199a5(mdo sde): kyi phyogs cha nas/ lho phyogs su mchi ba dag mthong lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das lho phyogs su rnam par bltas te/ snang ba chen po mthong nas bdag 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di la rgyu ni gang lags
199a6(mdo sde): snyam lags so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dpal me tog snying po des/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing /
199a7(mdo sde): 'di nas lho phyogs kyi phyogs man sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung brgyad cu'i bye ma snyed 'das nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed ces bya ba yod do// 'di ltar stsogs ma lnga dang ldan par gnas pa de na/
199b1(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tshe zhing gzhes la/ 'dus pa chen po la chos kyi tshul yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir dang //
199b2(mdo sde): dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung gi chos kyis gnas pa rgyun mi gcad par bya ba'i phyir/ da ltar theg pa gsum gyi rnam par gtan la dbab pa bstan pa'i sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs rab tu ston to// sangs
199b3(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed der bdud kyi yul rnam par gzhig pa dang / dri ma med par mdzad pa'i phyir dang / chos kyi rgyal mtshan pasgreng ba'i phyir dang / chos kyi tshul yun ring du gzhag pa'i phyir/ sangs
199b4(mdo sde): rgyas kyi 'dus pa chen po byung bar gyur to// der yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rin po che'i tog gi gzungs sngags gsungs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su spyad nas gshegs/
199b5(mdo sde): so// de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / nyan thos chen po rnams kyi 'dus pa chen po yang dag par sgrub par mdzad de/ so so yang
199b6(mdo sde): dag par rig pa bzhi dang / yang dag par ldan pa mig gsum pa'i tshangs pa'i gnas pa bstan kyang / de na da dung sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed sa dang nam mkha' gang ba zhig de bzhin gshegs pa
199b7(mdo sde): shAkya thub pa mchog tu snyan par gsung ba'i chos bstan pas tshim par ma gyur to// mchog tu snyan pa gsung ba shAkya thub pa de yang bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi dang / nyi ma'i snying po'i chos kyis gnas pa/
200a1(mdo sde): mu'i yul rnam par 'jig par mdzad pa'i 'od zer gyi le'u sems can rnams kyi las zad par byed pa'i gzungs sngags bshad par bzhed do// de bzhin gshegs pa de 'di snyam
200a2(mdo sde): du dgongs te/ phyogs bcu dang sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang su dag bskal pa brgyas nges par byung ba zhes bya ba nas/ gang dag srid pa tham pa
200a3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la gzhan gyi zing mi 'jog pa/ sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes la ma mkhas pa dag de'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed du 'jug par gyur cig/ 'dir 'khor nas
200a4(mdo sde): kyang rang rang gi dge ba'i phyogs kyi bsam gtan dag gis gnas par gyur cig/ de ltar sangs rgyas kyis zhing 'dir sa chen po lhag par mthu dang ldan pa dang / bcud dang ldan pa dang / yon tan dang ldan pa dag
200a5(mdo sde): gyur cig/ 'di ltar 'dir sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan bzhin du thams cad dran pa dang ldan pa dag dang / brtson 'grus dang ldan pa dag dang / gtong ba dang ldan pa dag dang / shes rab dang ldan pa dag tu gyur cig
200a6(mdo sde): de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang su dag phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag nas yang dag par zhugs pa de dag kyang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed 'di'i nang du chud par gyur cig/ de 'ad
200a7(mdo sde): du 'khod nas kyang rang rang gi dge ba'i phyogs la stobs ji lta ba dang / ji ltar 'tsham pa bzhin du 'khod nas/ bsam gtan byed par gyur cig snyam dgongs so// bsam gtan byed pa de dag kha cig gi lus las 'od
200b1(mdo sde): 'di lta bu dper na/ 'bru mar gyis mes bu byung ngo zhes bya ba nas/ kha cig gi lus las 'od 'di lta bu dper na/ zla ba dang / nyi ma bye ba phrag brgya stong mang po'i 'od lta bu byung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar du sbyar ro//
200b2(mdo sde): nad ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'dus pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed de snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to// da ltar gang dag phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na snyoms par zhug
200b3(mdo sde): bar gyur la/ sngon chad der phyin pa ni ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni/ da ltar ting nge 'dzin las langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi khong mi mjed der chas so// der phyin nas kyang de
200b4(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyur ro// 'dus pa chen po de yang mthong bar 'gyur ro// gzungs sngags de yang thos par 'gyur ro// skyil mo krung du 'dug nas/ rang rang gi dge ba'i
200b5(mdo sde): phyogs kyi bsam gtan rnam pa sna tshogs kyis rtse bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu khyod kyang da ltar ting nge 'dzin las langs kyis/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed der 'gro
200b6(mdo sde): bar bya'o// rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed de na/ yang sems can dag mchog tu tshe thung ba dag yin/ nad mang ba dag yin/ blo chung ba dag yin/ dge ba'i rtsa ba kun tu spyod pa chung ba dag yin
200b7(mdo sde): bsod nams chung ba dag yin/ dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bya ba tshol ba chung ba dag yon/ 'jig rten pha rol la 'jigs par mi lta ba dag yin/ longs spyod dang nye bar spyod pa chung ba dag yin
201a1(mdo sde): 'dod pa la 'chums pa dag yon/ mi dge ba spyod pa dag yon/ phrag dog dang ldan pa dag yin/ ngo tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod pa spangs pa dag yin te/ de dag phal
201a2(mdo sde): cher mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par blangs pas ngan song du 'gro ba dag yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de na gang dag 'dren mar spyod pa'i sems can yod pa de dag 'chi ba'i dus byas nas/
201a3(mdo sde): de nyid du sdig pa byed pa'i gnod sbyin zhes bya ba nas/ sdig pa byed pa'i lus srul po zhes bya ba'i bar dag tu skye bar 'gyur ba'i phyir te/ sdig pa byed pa'i gnod sbyin zhes bya ba nas/ lus srul po
201a4(mdo sde): zhes bya ba'i bar de dag kyang / der sa'i bcud kyi mdangs phrogs nas yongs su spyod par byed do// 'bru dang / sman dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / 'dab ma dang / ro rnams kyi mdangs phrogs
201a5(mdo sde): nas kyang yongs su spyod par byed do// de nas stobs dang ldan pa dag yin no// der de dag mngal na gnas pa'i mo rnams kyi mdangs dag 'phrog par byed do// mi rnams skyes pa tsam gyi mod dag la
201a6(mdo sde): myur du mngangs dag 'phrog par byed do// 'o ma'i mdangs dag kyang 'phrog par byed do// bza' ba dang / btung ba'i mdangs dag kyang 'phrog par byed do// der de dag gos mi mngal du zhugs pa'i
201a7(mdo sde): mdangs 'phrogs shing / skyes pa tsam gyi mod la mdangs phrogs pas de dag kyang mdangs la mi reg cing / bza' ba dang btung ba nyams pa/ yongs su spyad zin pa la yongs su spyod par byed
201b1(mdo sde): chu su na ma rnams sogatan bdag dang / nga bdag dung dran parnams pa dag dang / dge pa'i ma thathams cad las yongs sa thams pa pa dang / bsod rnams dang bral ba
201b2(mdo sde): 'jog rten pa rol la 'jigs par mi lta bdag dang / longs spyod dang / nye bar spyod pa dang bral ba dag dang / 'dod pa la 'dzums pa dag dang / kun spyod pa mi gnang bdag yin ces
201b3(mdo sde): bya ba nas/ mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par grangs pas/ ngan song du 'gro ba dag yin no// zhes bya ba'i bar yin no// rigs kyi bu sngon nga byang chub sems dpar gyur pa'i smon lam 'di lta
201b4(mdo sde): bur gyur te/ 'di ltar nga bya ba la brtson pa dang / spro ba dang brtul ba brtan par gyur to// sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag bzhugs pa ngas bsnyen bkur byas so// ngas thabs
201b5(mdo sde): gang dag gos bud med sbrum ma bsrung bar nus pa yang yongs su zhus so// nga'i brtson 'grus gang gis ma bde legs su 'gyur ba dang / mngal na yod pa bde legs su 'gyur ba yang yongs su thas
201b6(mdo sde): so// lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin nam/ chen po 'am/ nam mkha' lding ngam/ mi 'am ci 'am/ lto 'phye chen po 'am/ grul bum mam/ yi dgas sam/ sha za 'am/ srul po 'am/
201b7(mdo sde): lus srul po 'am/ mdangs 'phrog pa 'am/ brjed byed dam/ rims nyin gcig pa 'am/ nyin gnyis pa 'am/ nyon gsum pa 'am/ nyin bzhi pa 'am/ ro langs gang yang drug
202a1(mdo sde): gas sngags kyi sbyor ba 'am/ sman gyi sbyor bas lus dang sems la gnod par bya bar mo nus pa yongs su zhus so// gang gis kyang ma 'am mngal na yod pa dang /
202a2(mdo sde): skyes ma thag pa dang / 'o ma 'thung ba dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba yongs su spyod pa la gnod par bya ba mi nus pa yongs su zhus so// gang gis kyang mngangs 'phrog pa 'am/ lus dkrug pa 'am/
202a3(mdo sde): khams dkrug par bya ba mi nus pa yongs su zhus so// gang gi phyir sems can de dag tha mal par mngal na gnas pa yongs su zhus so// lus dang sems la rnam par mtho ma brtsams par bde bar
202a4(mdo sde): mi'i mngal nas gnod pa med par 'gyur ba yongs su zhus so// bde bar 'o ma 'thung ba yongs su zhus so// bde bar bza' ba dang btung ba yongs su spyad pa yongs su zhus so// gnod pa chung ba
202a5(mdo sde): dang tshe ring ba dang / tho dang ldan pa zhes bya ba nas/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par blangs pa'i bar dang / sbyin pa dang / dul ba dang / yang dag par sdom pa la mngon par dga' ba dang /
202a6(mdo sde): 'jig rten pha rol la 'jigs par lta ba yin pa dag kyang yongs su zhus so// ngas gsang sngags gang dag dang / sman gang dag gos sems can de lta bu dag yongs su smin par mdzad pa'i spyod pa 'i gas
202a7(mdo sde): sngags de dag ni gang yin/ sman de dag ni gang yin zhe na/ gzungs sngags gang gis ngas sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dpag tu med pa yongs su smin par mdzad pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug la
202b1(mdo sde): sho ba/ rig pa sod pa'i sbubs zhi ba gsang sngags kyi gzhi'i gzungs sngags lung bstan pa chen po 'di sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang ngal bstan par gyur to// rtag
202b2(mdo sde): tu brtson 'grus dang brtul ba brtan pa ngas rtag par rgyun tu mo rab de dang / de dag tu mngal na bu yod pa'i bud med la rig pa yod pa'i sbubs zhi ba gzungs sngags gsang sngags kyi gzhi rig sngags 'dis bsrung
202b3(mdo sde): ba byas so// zung med de mang lan bu yod pa dang btsas te/ sbubs gsum la rnam par gzhag go// phyin chad kyang lha 'am zhes bya ba nas/ bdud dam/ brjed byed dam/ mi dang mi ma yin pa zhes
202b4(mdo sde): bya ba'i bar gyis mi'i mang lan bu yod pa dang bcas te/ rnam par mtho btsum pa 'am/ rnam par gtse ba 'am/ lus dkrug pa 'am/ khams dkrug pa 'am/ sems dkrug par bya bar mi nus so//
202b5(mdo sde): lha dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar gyis kyang mdangs 'phrog pa 'am/ sman dang sngags kyi sbyor ba bya bar mi nus so// de dag gis mngal na bu yod pa'i ma rnam par mtho ma brtsams
202b6(mdo sde): na pa rnam par mthom btsams pa dang mngal na bu gnas pa yang sngon gyi tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro// ting mtshams sbyor ba'i lus kyis dbang po thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa dang
202b7(mdo sde): gzugs bzang ba blta na sdug pa kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa dag dang / shin tu blo dang ldan pa dag bde legs su ma'i lto nas byung zhing brjed ngas pa med pa'i
203a1(mdo sde): sems dang ldan pa dag tu gyur to// de dag skyes pa tsam gyi song la yang lha stobs dang ldan/ dbang che bar grags pa re re la yang 'khor brgya stong yod pa dag srung ba dang rjes/
203a2(mdo sde): sulba bar byed par kun tu gnas so// de dag mi dang mi ma yin pa zhes bya ba'i bar gang gang gis kyang rnam par mtho btsam pa 'am/ rnam par gtse ba 'am/ lus dkrug pa 'am/ khams dkrug pa
203a3(mdo sde): 'am/ sems dkrug par bya bar mi nus so// mdangs zung bar yang mi nus so// gsang sngags dang sman mos kyang rnam par mtho brtsams par mi nus so// gang gi phyir sems can de dag ma chog tu
203a4(mdo sde): gzugs dang ldan pa dang / tshe rabs dran pa dang / 'jig rten pha rol la 'jigs par lta ba dang / byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang / snying rje chen po dang ldan pa dang / gtong ba dang ldan pa
203a5(mdo sde): dang / tshul khrims la rjes su dga' ba dang / bzod pa dang / yon tan dang / brtson 'grus dang ldan pa dang / dben pa la dga' zhing bsam gtan la mngon par brtson pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen
203a6(mdo sde): la mngon par dga' ba dag dang / de thob par byed pa'i sdug bsngal yang dag par zad par 'gro ba 'phags pa'i nges par 'byin pa'i shes rab dang ldan pa dag tu gyur to// sems can nye bar zhi ba la
203a7(mdo sde): gnas pa nyon mongs pa chung ba de lta bu de dag la lha dang / klu dang gnod sbyin rnams kyis rim gror bya bar brtson pa dag yin te/ mi de dag kyang mchog tu 'khor ba la skyon du lta ba dang /
203b1(mdo sde): byang grol gyi bde ba 'dod pa dag tu gyur to// de dag gis gal te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ de dag ris 'thun pa de nyid kyis myur du byang chub kyi sems ma brjed
203b2(mdo sde): par byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur to// ji ste rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la sem bskyed na/ de dag gyur du skye ba dang / 'jig pa dang / rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa thob par gyur to//
203b3(mdo sde): ji ste sems can de dag kyang nyan thos kyi theg pa la sems skyed par byed na/ sems can de dag ris 'thun pa nyid kyis/ bden pa dang rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa thob par byed do// sems can
203b4(mdo sde): de dag thams cad kyang ngan song gsum dang bral ba dang / mtho ris su 'gro ba dag tu gyur to// rigs kyi bu ngas thabs la 'jug pa'i sbyor ba la brtul ba des sems can dag yongs su smin par
203b5(mdo sde): byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs so// rigs kyi bu rig pa yod pa'i sbubs zhi ba lung bstan pa chen po 'di ni de ltar don che ba yin no// rigs kyi bu ngas/
203b6(mdo sde): sems can nad pa gang dag mthong ba de dag la rig pa yod pa'i sbubs zhi ba lung bstan pa chen po 'dis sman sang ha kI ra la brabs nas nad pa la byin na/ nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar gyur to//
203b7(mdo sde): gang na sman sing ha kIr med par yang / ngas de'i mdun du bza' ba dang btung ba gang yon pa la rig pa yod pa'i sbubs zhi ba lung bstan pas brabs nas nad pa la byin na nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar
204a1(mdo sde): gyur to// gal te de yang med par gyur na/ ngas sman bkus te bor ba la rig pa yod pa'i sbubs zhi ba'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi dag gos brabs nas nad pa la byin na/ nad
204a2(mdo sde): thams cad rab tu zhi bar gyur to// rigs kyi bu ngas thabs la 'jug pa'i sbyor ba la brtul ba des/ sems can rnams yongs su smin par byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
204a3(mdo sde): byang chub kyang yang dag par bsgrubs so// gang na shing ljon pa dag me tog dang 'bras bu mi skye ba der yang ngas rig pa yod pa'i sbubs zhi ba gsang sngags kyi gzhi chen po dag gos char pa'i tshul brab
204a4(mdo sde): nasashing dag la btab na/ shing de dag lo mang por chu med kyang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dag dang ldan par gyur to// de bzhin du bu ram shing dang / rgun 'brum dag dang / 'bru dang /
204a5(mdo sde): sman dag gi bar dag la yang byas so// gang na char mi 'bab cing chu med pa der yang ngas rus sbal gyi snying la rig pa yod pa'i sbubs zhi ba gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'dis brabs nas shing tsam/
204a6(mdo sde): pa ka'i 'dab mas dkris te/ klu rgya mtsho'i 'gram du bzhag na/ char chen po dang / chu chen po'i tshogs 'byung bar gyur to// der chu chen po byung bas sems can rnams kyi khyib dang / zhing
204a7(mdo sde): dang kun dga' ra ba'i bar chung za bar gyur na/ der yang ngas sbrul gyi rgyal po'i nor bu la rig pa yong pa'i sbubs zhi ba'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'dis thabs nas/ klu'i gnas su bzhag na
204b1(mdo sde): char chu rab tu zhi bar gyur to// gang na dus ma yin par rlung dang / nyi ma dang / dus ma yin par sprin dang / mun pa dang / rdul gyi char pa dang / grang ba dang / dro ba dang / dus phyin ci log tu
204b2(mdo sde): 'byung ba'i bar dang / dmag tshogs dang / zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / gza' dang / rgyu skar dang / zla ba dang / zla ba phyed dang / dus tshigs dang / lo rnams yang dag par 'byung ba ma yin pa'i
204b3(mdo sde): bar la ngas snying rjes sems can rnams kyi ched du zhag bdun pa gcig gi nyon mtshan du khrus byas nas/ 'o ma dang 'bras chan gyi kha zas za zhing / tshangs pa'i gnas pa bsgom pa la mngon par dga'
204b4(mdo sde): bas rig pa yod pa'i sbubs zhi ba lung bstan pa 'di las gzhan mi byed par brjod de/ nyin bdun pa la gal te yul yongs su ma bskyangs na/ der nga'i mdun du rang gi dam bcas pas mi gnas pa
204b5(mdo sde): yin no// der yang ngas rtsi ldum pa sbrul gyi snying dang bcas pa la rig pa yod pa'i sbubs zhi ba lung bstan pa chen po 'dis brabs shing / skyug sman ma da na'i 'bras bu dag dang bsres te lha rten
204b6(mdo sde): sar bzhag pas/ der dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang / nyi ma dang / sprin dang / mun pa dang / rdul gyi char pa dag dang / dro ba thams cad zhi bar gyur to// yang dag pa'i dus tshigs
204b7(mdo sde): dang zla ba dang / nyi ma dang/ gza' dang / rgyu skar dang / zla ba dang / zla ba byed pa dang / lo yang dag par byung bar gyur to// rigs kyi bu nges na gang na sems can dge
205a1(mdo sde): mtshan dang / bkra shis dang / so sor ldan pa dag dang / lta ba phyin ci log tu gyur pa'i bar gyi sems can de dag la ngas rig pa yod pa'i sbubs zhi ba lung bstan pa chen po
205a2(mdo sde): 'di'i chos bstan to// gang dag gang du sems can rnams kyis thos pa de dang der nyon mongs chung ngu dag tu gyur to// dge mtshan dang / bkra shis dang / lta ba ngan pa thams cad spangs te/
205a3(mdo sde): de phyin chad dge ba'i las dang yang dag par ldan pa/ legs par byas pa'i las kyi mtha' dang / smon lam dag mang ba nges pa'i phung po dag tu gyur to// rigs kyi bu de bzhin du ngas thabs la 'jug
205a4(mdo sde): pa'i sbyor ba la brtul ba des/ sems can rnams yongs su smin par byas shing / pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi bar yongs su rdzogs par byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang
205a5(mdo sde): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// rig pa yod pa'i sbubs zhi ba lung bstan pa chen po 'di ni de ltar sems can rnams la gces spras byed pa yin no// de ltar phan yon mang ba yin te/
205a6(mdo sde): sems can thams cad la phan par byed pa/ nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ bud med sbrum ma thams cad srung bar byed pa/ rab tu thar par byed pa/ nyon mongs pa thams cad zhi bar
205a7(mdo sde): byed pa dang / phung po dang / khams thams cad yongs su shes par byed pa chos thams cad rnam par 'byed pa/ thabs thams cad yang dag par ston par byed pa/ byang grol gyi bde ba
205b1(mdo sde): thams cad yongs su rtogs par byed pa/ sems can thams cad rab tu dad par byed pa chos thams cad kyi bde bar byed pa la 'jug par byed pa/ bdud dang / phas kyi rgol ba thams cad
205b2(mdo sde): chos dang 'thun pas tshar gcod par byed pa bdud kyi yul thams cad nges par 'dul bar byed pa yin no// rigs kyi bu rig pa yod pa'i sbubs zhi ba lung bstan pa chen po 'di ni bdud rnams
205b3(mdo sde): char gcod par byed cing / nyon mongs pa rnams pham par byed pa yin te/ lha rnams dga' bar byed pa/ gnod sbyin rnams yang dag par mgu bar byed pa/ lha ma yin rnams rnam
205b4(mdo sde): par 'jom par byed pa/ nam mkha' lding rnams dang bar byed pa/ mi 'am ci rnams dad par byed pa/ lto 'phye chen po rnams rgyab kyis phyogs par byed pa/ 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang /
205b5(mdo sde): mu ge dang / 'chib dang / nang dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang / char pa dang / nang thams cad rnam par zhi bar byed pa/ zang ba dang / rdo ba dang / kha
205b6(mdo sde): dang tsha ba dang / rtsub pa dang / drung phung po dang / reg par dka' ba'i dngos po rnams rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ chos thams cad kyi chos kyi tshul 'bar bar byed pa/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa
205b7(mdo sde): rton par byed pa/ dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi 'chad par byed pa/ 'khor bas skrag pa rnams dbugs 'byin par byed pa/ zad pa shes pa skyed par byed pa/ mi skye ba shes pa
206a1(mdo sde): rang gi mngon sum du byed pa/ ma rig pa'i mun pa'i phung po thams cad rab tu 'jig par byed pa/ sdug bsngal gyi khur 'dor bar byed pa yin no// rig pa yod pa'i
206a2(mdo sde): sbubs zhi ba lung bstan pa chen po ni 'di yin te/ tad+yathA/ ma nA k+Sha/ a bA k+Sha/ g+ha sA k+Sha/ dza na k+Sha/ maman k+Sha/ k+Sha bak+Sha/ man d+hAk+Sha/ nA TAnA k+Sha/ nad ra phu/ bi sa Na TA/
206a3(mdo sde): kha ba naH/ a Ta naT/ kun+ta// pU ri ga naH/ mAn+ta naT/ ba ri ka naH/ u Ta ra na Ta/ bi naT/ kun dzan/ \u0f7f/ tsabram b+ha ra ma/ lag sa b+ha ba daT/ pra sha ra na// song
206a4(mdo sde): tra na Ta/ sa mA la naT/ shai ri ku sa kau na Ta/ ta la mA ruT/ kha te gU k+Sha/ ba ti rak+Sha dA ma ra dzu/ bA ha na bu ti/ sa nA ti ra na dza ba/ a mo ho ra ga dza la a tri nA/ a trinA
206a5(mdo sde): ra ba a tI nAk+Sha/ a ba ha/ man tri nA k+Sha/ e Sha/ e bAn to dul s+ya swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa 'di bstan pa na/ 'khor der srog chags bye ba phrag drug cu ni rjes su
206a6(mdo sde): 'thun pa'i bzod pa thob par gyur to// dkrigs pa phrag drug cu dag kyang skyon med pa la zhugs par gyur to// rigs kyi bu rig pa yod pa'i sbubs zhi ba lung bstan pa chen po 'di/ de bzhin
206a7(mdo sde): gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la ngas khyod kyi lag nas bskur ro// der yang nyi ma'i snying po'i chos kyis gnas pa/ klu'i yul rnam par 'jig par mdzad pa'i 'od zer gyi le'u sems can/
206b1(mdo sde): rnams kyi las zad par 'gyur ba'i gzungs sngags lang dad pa sbyin par mdzad do// rig pa yod pa'i sbubs zhi ba 'di long la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed der song zhig/ nga'i bkas de
206b2(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la gnod pa chung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes kyang zhus shig/ 'di skad du byung phyogs na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs
206b3(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung brgyad cu'i bye ma snyed 'das pa de na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing stsogs ma lnga dang ldan pa/ sgra thams cad yang dag par 'phags pa zhes bya ba yod de/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na
206b4(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal me tog gi snying po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to// de bzhin gshegs pa des sangs rgyas kyi
206b5(mdo sde): zhing de nas/ bcom ldan 'das la yongs su zhu ba'i slad du/ bdag mngags pa lags na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das spun mi mnga' lags sam/ gnod pa chung lags sam/ khyod kyi 'khor bro 'tshal
206b6(mdo sde): bdag ma mchis lags sam/ gnod pa dag chung lags sam/ dam pa'i chos nyan par 'tshal ba dag lags sam/ ji ltarare chos thos pa bzhin du chos de la nan tan snying por bgyid pa dag lags sam/
206b7(mdo sde): chos kyis gnas pa dag gis gnas par bgyid lags sam/ khyod kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na bdud kyi yul dang / klu'i yul bcom lags sam/ khyod kyi sangs rgyas kyi yul gcig pu lags
207a1(mdo sde): 'don thogs pa sa ma sa pas/ 'khor lo rab tu bskor lags sa/ gang spangags sa rgyas kyi yang 'dir 'khor lo 'askor bar 'dzad pa de dag gi ched du bzhin
207a2(mdo sde): gshegs pa dpal me tog gi sdong po des 'dir nyi mra'i snying po chos kyis gnas pa gru'i yul rnam par 'jig par mdzad pa'i 'od zer gyi le'u sems can rnams kyi las 'byung ba'i gzungs sngags la dad pa/
207a3(mdo sde): stsol bar mdzad cing de nas rig pa chen po yod pa'i sbubs zhi ba lung bstan pa chen po mthu che ba phan yon meb 'di bskur lags te/ sems can thams cad la phan par bgyid pa/
207a4(mdo sde): nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa nyon mongs pa thams cad zhi bar bgyid pa zhes bya ba nas sdug bsngal gyi khur 'dor bar bgyid pa zhes bya ba'i bar rig pa yod pa'i sbubs zhi ba lung
207a5(mdo sde): bstan pa chen po 'di lags so zhes kyang gsol cig/ de na thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de ngo mtshar thob cing / rmad du byung ba thob nas 'di skad ces gsol to// sangs rgyas
207a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos thams cad la ma thogs pa'i ye shes dang / gzigs pa ni ngo mtshar to// mchog tu ngo mtshar to// de lta lags pas da ltar de bzhin gsheg
207a7(mdo sde): pas bdag cag la sngon ma thos pa 'di ltar zab pa rig pa yod pa'i sbubs zhi ba lung bstan pa chen po sems can thams cad la phan par byed pa 'di kho na bstan to// gang la yon tan
207b1(mdo sde): du la tu das sa pa sa sa pa byang na rol par byu bas na par brton par badzud sa ng+yas ma sam gang pos 'dudang /
207b2(mdo sde): sas to// mas nangs dag 'khor bas thag tsang byang grol gyi ba ba mngon par 'ams pan bcos ldan 'das kyil sa yosas 'thags pa dang / rag
207b3(mdo sde): rgyas pa'i sbubs pa pa'i gzungs sngags kyi nga yongs su bslags pan+d+ha dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba dang / bus pas sems can rnams kyi rnyed pa chen po dang / dge ba'i
207b4(mdo sde): phyogs rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur lags so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dpal me tog gi skyong pos 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no// khyod
207b5(mdo sde): kyis ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ rigs kyi bung byang chub sems dpar gyur te/ brtson pa 'dis spyad pa spyod pa na smon lam 'di lta bu btab bo// bdag byang chub thob nas
207b6(mdo sde): sems can gang su dag phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na sbyin pa la brtson pa'i bsam pa can zhes bya ba nas shes rab la brtson pa'i bsam pa can zhes bya ba'i bar
207b7(mdo sde): ngag gis bdag gi ming sgrogs par byed cing sems can thams cad kyis sems par byed na de gal te de dag la lha dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten na sems
208a1(mdo sde): can la la pha rol tu phyin pa de dang de dag gi par chad byed par nus pa zhig yod na sems can de dag gi dge ba'i phyogs 'phel ba brgya stong du mar gyur cig ljon
208a2(mdo sde): gyi las kyi 'bras bu'i rgyun ni ma gtogs so// bdag kyang re zhig tha na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cig/ gang yang bud med bu
208a3(mdo sde): la mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba nas bul khur gyis skyo ba zhes bya ba'i bar dang gang bud med sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i bar bdag la phyag 'tshal bar byed cing sems can thams
208a4(mdo sde): cad kyis dga' ba dang / gus pa dang / dad pas bdag gi ming yongs su sgrogs par byed la gal te ma 'am/ mngal na yod pa de la mi 'am mi ma yin pa sdang ba'i sems kyis
208a5(mdo sde): rnam par mtho 'tsham par byed dam sman dang / gsang sngags kyi sbyor bas kyang rung ste lus kun tu 'khrug par byed dam/ sems kun tu 'khrug par byed dam zhes bya ba nas btsas
208a6(mdo sde): pa tsam gyi bar la yang tha na yud tsam cig tsam yang rnam par mtho 'tsham par byed na/ bdag re zhig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cig
208a7(mdo sde): ces sngon nga byang chub sems dpar gyur pa'i smon lam de lta bu btab bo// de bzhin du da ltar yang sems can gang dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na sdug bsngal de lta bus gzir ba
208b1(mdo sde): dag zung zhes bya ba nas ji ltar sbyar bstan pa bzhin sems nan thams cad kyis dga' ba dang / sus pa dang / dad pas 'dag gsang yongs su thogs par byed pa thams cad/
208b2(mdo sde): drug pa thas de dag las yongs su bral ba 'gyur te/ gzhan du ma yin no// sbyangs pa ma yin na/ sngon gyi las kyi 'bras bu'i rgyun ma gtogs so//
208b3(mdo sde): 'phags pa shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i sde nyi ma'i sdong po zhes bya ba'i mdo bam po lnga pa/ des 'di lad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
208b4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mdzad ni ngo mtshar lags te/ de na sems can rnams mchog tu snang ba gzu lums can/ rtsub pa zag dog dang ldan pa/ spong brtse ba ma mchis pa
208b5(mdo sde): bgyis pa mi gzo ba/ tshig rtsub por smra ba/ log par lta ba dag lags/ der kha cig gis bdag la rnam par mtho btsams pa mi rung ste bdag mchis pas ci yang mi sman lags so// bcom
208b6(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med do// sus dmigs pa med pa'i tshangs pa'i gnas pa lags par bsgoms shing legs par
208b7(mdo sde): yid la byas par gyur pa de la ni bdud bye bas kyang rnam par mtho btsams pa 'am/ bar chad byed par nus pa 'di ni gnas med do// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis yun ring po nas dmigs pa med/
209a1(mdo sde): pa'i tshangs pa'i gnas pa shin tu bsgoms shing legs par yid la byas zin gyis ma 'jigs shig/ rigs kyi bu khyod la gsang sngags gang dag gis snang ba thams cad dad pa
209a2(mdo sde): 'gyur ba dang / rmongs par 'gyur ba dang / gang gis bzod pa dang / dran pa dang / rab tu dang ba thob par byed pa'i gzungs sngags dmigs pa med pa'i tshangs pa'i gnas pa'i rgyu 'thun pa byams pa/
209a3(mdo sde): chen po sbyin par mdzad do// tad+ya thA/ bo bri ha/ bu bu la/ e la bA ra/ i la swA hA/ ha Ta ga Ta/ ga ga nA k+Sha/ sha ma sha ma/ maud tra/ ming tra tsakra brti ti le sa b+ha ra/
209a4(mdo sde): ti le/ durbA li/ hi hi le/ ha ba he/ na ra dza Te/ ya ba na mr-id te/ k+Shan ti/ mi te/ mrid tra rA me/ mr-id ta kha g+ha/ sarba satwo dza mr-i te/ sarba kra ma mr-id tren ma brta mr-id tre/
209a5(mdo sde): d+hI tI shwa ra mrid tre swA hA/ rigs kyi bu sdang ba zhi bar byed pa dang / rmongs par byed pa'i gsang sngags kyi gzungs sngags 'dis tsam pa ka'i 'bru mar la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas pas lag pa
209a6(mdo sde): gnyis la bslus na/ sdang ba thams cad dad par byed/ rmongs par byed cing / sdang ba'i sbrul dag dang / sdang ba'i gnod sbyin dang / grul bum dang / srul po dang / bdud bye ba brgya stong
209a7(mdo sde): yang rung ste/ sdang po'i sems dang ldan pa'i sems can de dag gis ci yang byed par mi nus so// gal te sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa thams cad kyis gling bzhi pa gang bar gyur kyang sbyor du
209b1(mdo sde): gtsugags thabs nang do'i yong khon la med par 'gyur ro// phul te mu rnyog pa can gyis sumatsho ba'i yongs su byung bar gyur cang rung sbyor nu gcig lo nas rab tu dang bar byed do// 'di la the tsom me
209b2(mdo sde): kyis long la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du song zhig/ yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs meng dpag tu med pas tshig 'thun par 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom
209b3(mdo sde): ldan 'das bdag cag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / 'dus pa chen po blta ba dang / nyi ma'i snying po'i chos kyis gnas bkru
209b4(mdo sde): yul rnam par 'jig par mdzad pa'i 'od zer gyi le'u sems can rnams kyi las 'byang ba'i gzungs sngags de yang mnyan par 'tshal lags na btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te der bdag cag kyang
209b5(mdo sde): mchir gnang ba lta na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed du bdag cag mchi lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dpal me tog gi snying po des 'di skad ces bka'
209b6(mdo sde): stsal to// rigs kyi bu dag khyed thams cad so so nas/ thong bzhi pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i cha byung dang / rtags dang / dbyibs dang / yo byad dang / spyod lam gyis lhan cig 'thun
209b7(mdo sde): par da bzhi// de nas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag brgyad nu po de dag thams cad thong ban pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i mabyang dang / rtags dang / dbyibs dang / yo byang dang
210a1(mdo sde): spyod lam mngon par sprul nas byang chub sems dpa' nam ma'i spang ba la sogs pa thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa dpal me tog gi zhing po'i zhabs gnyis la mgo thos phyag
210a2(mdo sde): 'tshal te/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas nas mkha' la 'khod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po re res kyang rin po che las byas pa'i bkra'adab ma stong pa bdun bdun
210a3(mdo sde): dang dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa yang mngon par sprul to// spyod lam de lta bus de nas chas te/ de dag thams cad skad cig zang cig gcig gos sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed 'dor
210a4(mdo sde): 'khod de/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed thams cad du kha cig gis ni
210a5(mdo sde): gser gyi bye ma'i char mngon par rab tu phab bo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir/ kha cig gis ni
210a6(mdo sde): dngul gyi bye ma'i char mngon par rab tu phab bo// kha cig gis ni spos kyi bye mo'i char mngon par rab tu phab bo// kha cig gis ni mu tig gi char mngon par rab tu phab bo// kha cig gis ni
210a7(mdo sde): gser srung dag mngon par rab tu phab bo// kha cig gis ni mu tig gi do shal dag mngon par rab tu phab bo// kha cig gos ni dpung rgyan gyi rgyan dag mngon par rab tu bab bo// kha cig gos ni
210b1(mdo sde): sa byu / shu dang/ / na dzin par t+yA sh+tsa/ sa ya rgyas su rnam sa 'angs ng+gA lan gsas
210b2(mdo sde): byas nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod par gyur to// theg pa chen po 'dus pa chen po'i mdo/ nyi ma snying po'i le'u las po tsa'i le'u skye gnyis pa rdzogs so//
210b3(mdo sde): tshul po gzugs can spong pos mngon ma mthong ba tshangs pa chen pa dang / bcwa byin dang / med med kyi bu dang / thong bas pa'i 'khor los sbyar ba zangs me dpag tu med pa mthong nas/
210b4(mdo sde): mchog tu ngo mnar du gyur to// gtan las langs nasaha cang yang zag mi ring bar 'dug go// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi po nya bzhi po de dag 'khor dang
210b5(mdo sde): bcas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa gal ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba rab tu btung nas 'khod do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma'i shugs kyi snying pos kyang /
210b6(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ga la ba de logs su me tog tsam pa ka'i 'phreng ba dag gtor te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang gsol to// rkang gnyis dam pa 'gro ba'i
210b7(mdo sde): snang ba 'dzin// lta ba nyams pa'i 'gro ba'i lam stsol ba/ mnyam nyid ldan pa 'gro la phan mdzad khyod// bdud dang klu rnams myur du 'dul mdzad khyod// 'dul dka'
211a1(mdo sde): 'pho ba nyon mongs thar mdzang khyod/ chos 'dir snang ba skrun ring 'bar mdzad khyod/ bsam gtan no 'di dag gis skyes mchog ldan// zhing yang thams cad shin tu
211a2(mdo sde): mdzes par mdzad// rgyal ba skyes mchog skye bo mkhas dgul// cung ring nas ni zhing 'di brjod par mdzad// 'gro ba'i chos kyi dus 'odi dka' ba ste// de mthong bdag 'dir chos ched tshogs
211a3(mdo sde): su mchis// 'gro ba mor skye ba ni rnyed par dka'// shin tu ring nas mir skye rnyed nas kyang // nyon mongs chen pos zin gyur thub khyod ni// rab myur nyon mongs zla ba gcod mdzad lags// sdug
211a4(mdo sde): bsngal mtsho dang nyon mongs klung lhung ba// khyod kyis glang chen lta bur 'gro ba bsgral// rgyal bas phan tshun bdag cag po nyar mngags// khyod kyi chos kyi gter la yi rang mdzad// btsun pa
211a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das shar phyogs na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i grung dpag tu ma mchis pa'i bye ma skyed 'das pa de na/ 'jig rten gyi khams ma dros pa zhes bgyi ba
211a6(mdo sde): mchis so// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tsam pa ka'i mdog ces bgyi ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang
211a7(mdo sde): ston to// de bzhin gshegs pa de bdag 'dir mngags lags te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de khyod nyi ma'i snying po'i chos kyis gnas pa/ glu'i yul rnam par 'jig par mdzad pa'i 'od zer
211b1(mdo sde): tsa le'u sems can rnams kyi las 'byung ba'i gzungs sngags 'di 'chad pa la dad pa sbyin par mdzad cing gnod pa chung ngus// bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang bde ba la reg par gnas sam
211b2(mdo sde): zhes kyang zhu bar mdzad lags na/ bcom ldan 'das ci spun mi mnga' lags sam/ gnod pa chung lags sam/ khyod kyi 'khor blo 'tshal ba ma mchis sam/ gnod pa chung lags sam/ chos
211b3(mdo sde): nyan par 'tshal ba dag lags sam/ ji ltar chos thos pa bzhin du chos de la nan tan snying por bgyid pa dag lags sam/ chos kyi gnas pas gnas par bgyid lags sam/ khyod kyi sangs
211b4(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing 'di na bdud kyi yul dang klu'i yul bcom lags sam/ khyod kyi sangs rgyas kyi yul gcig pu lags sam/ 'di na thogs pa ma mchis par 'khor lo bskor lags sam/
211b5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi yul 'di na gang su dag 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur ba de dag gi don du de bzhin gshegs pa tsam pa ka'i mdog de khyod dang nyi ma'i snying po chos kyis gnas pa klu'i yul 'jig pa'i
211b6(mdo sde): 'od zer gyi le'u gzungs sngags 'di la dad par sbyin par mdzad lags so// de nas bden pa dang rjes su 'thun pa'i gzungs sngags mthu che ba/ phan yon meb/ 'dod pa'i 'dod chags
211b7(mdo sde): thams cad zad par bgyid pa/ gzugs kyi 'dod chags thams cad zad par bgyid pa/ gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags thams cad zad par bgyid pa/ nga rgyal dang / lhag pa'i ngargyal dang /
212a1(mdo sde): nga'o snyam pa'i brtul thams cad zad par bgyid pa 'di yang 'akur lags so zhes bya ba ltar gyur bshad pa bzhin te/ bden pa dang rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa 'di ni/ bdud
212a2(mdo sde): rnams tshar gcod pa/ klu rnams pham par bgyid pa/ lha rnams dga' bar bgyid pa/ gnod sbyin rnams tshim par bgyid pa/ lha ma yon rnams rnam par 'joms par bgyid pa/ rje'u rags
212a3(mdo sde): rnams dga' bar bgyid pa dmangs rigs rnams mchog tu dkaga' bar bgyid pa/ bud med rnams 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyid pa mang du thos pa rnams skyo bar bgyid pa rnal 'byor
212a4(mdo sde): spyod pa rnams mngon par dga' bar bgyid pa/ nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / mu ge dang dus ma lags pa'i nang dang pha rol gyi dmag tshogs
212a5(mdo sde): dang / rlung dang / char pa dang / chu bo dang / zang ba dang / rdo ba thams cad rnam par zhi bar bgyid pa khab dang / tsha ba dang / ro mi tho ba dang / rtsub pa dang / thung hrung po
212a6(mdo sde): dang rig par dga' ba'i dngos po rnams rab tu zhi bar bgyod pa chos kyi tshul 'bar bar bgyid pa/ chos kyi tshul rgyun mi 'chang par bgyid pa/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa rton par bgyid pa/
212a7(mdo sde): 'khor bas skrag pa rnams dbugs 'byin par bgyid pa bang pa shes pa skye bar bgyid pa/ mi skye ba shes pa rtogs par bgyid pa ma rig pa'i mun pa'i phung po rab tu 'joms par
212b1(mdo sde): / stsal dus da du'i thung rnams par tsun pa 'ang ya / la par /
212b2(mdo sde): zo tab par ba rnye a ba pa dza ba d+ha / ma le ma le ba ri ba re/ sgye la b+ha ba ba re/ a mo k+She/ a los par ThA ra/ ka me rnas
212b3(mdo sde): na re radze rang ba ri b+ha re/ sa le si la pa ri pU re/ gse gas pa ra d+ha re/ a bo tse/ a bo tsa ba ra bA re / ma la ma la me la mar lA rAl ka la ra ma bi d+hu twe nam thu tang ga me b+hu rba tang /
212b4(mdo sde): pa ri Thare/ na tra shra he/ tsak+Sha gra ha ba ri bA re/ shod tra gra he ka god tra gra ha kha ri bA re / g+hAn tha he/ b+hA NA tha ha / pa ri bA re/ dzi hA gra he dzi hwA tha ha/ pa ri bA re/ ka ya gra he kA ya tha ha/ ba ra
212b5(mdo sde): bA re/ man gr-i he/ ma naH ha/ ba ra bA re/ swar+Ya tha he/ swaR+sha gra ha/ pa ri bA re/ bai da nAH he/ be da nA tha ha/ pa ri ba re/ tri shA tha te/ tri shwa tha ha/ pa ri bA re/ u ba nA rba te
212b6(mdo sde): u ba da na rbahapa ri bA re/ bA ba rba ha pa ra ha re/ dza te gra he dza ta rba ha/ ba ra b+ha re/ dza ra sA ra Na Tha he/ dzA nA mA ra Na \u0f7f\u0f7f/ pa ri ba re/ du kha san tA bza he/ du la san tA parba ha/
212b7(mdo sde): pa ba re/ A ra pa ra d+h+wa dza/ a ra pa rad+ha dza/ rba ha pa ri bA re An par dri'i bri he/ A na pa dri 'a rba ha/ pa ri shwa re/ a han bi bta/ bya a par sra ba mas su/ bai b+ha bi ni brtas kyar
213a1(mdo sde): shA sa ma be sha shan ti ta/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa cam pa ka'i mdog des bden pa dang rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa srung ban 'di lags so//
213a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang legs so zhes bya ba gzung ngo // sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed du thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor lpags pas kyang legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ bsam gtan la snyoms
213a3(mdo sde): par zhugs pa dag ni ma gtogs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma'i shugs kyi sdong po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu 'dir bstan 'di nyid la
213a4(mdo sde): bzhugs bzhin sems can rnams la don dang bcas pa/ tshig 'bru dang bcas pa/ lhag chad med pa'i bden pa dang rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa rgya cher ston par mdzad do// rigs kyi bu de bzhin
213a5(mdo sde): gshegs pa tsam pa ka'i mdog gos gang khyod 'dir 'ong ba'i tshe bsrung ba'i phyir/ byin pa lus kyi khyad pa thams cad sgrub pa zhes bya ba nas/ shin tu yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa grub pa zhes
213a6(mdo sde): bya ba'i bar nyi ma'i spyan pad+ma'i sbu gu'i gzungs sngags de khyod kyis kyang skyon cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi mo'i shugs kyi sdong pos 'di skad ces gsol to//
213a7(mdo sde): s+yAd ya the dan/ sid d+ha ma taM/ bi lo ka ma te/ e le ke ta ri she/ ru tse/ su ru tsa/ bud d+he/ bi bud d+he/ mahA bud d+he/ un mang te/ un mad ta/ pra ti she d+ha ne/
213b1(mdo sde): ramadrunag rngub pa ti shweHne/ bon du/ ban dus te/ tsat+ta tsaHrba/ ge d+han/ 9 tsan naH/ swAHtsa ti/ naH/ naH/ 1/ sa/ 9/ tata/ dz+nyAn
213b2(mdo sde): dzi/ tsi ta nar+thargas pa ti/ ha ta bi ma ta pud d+he/ ha tA ya k+She/ ha ta la k+She/ hata ShaSh+Te/ hata sa sur+b+ba dza be/ hata bi man ra dze/ ha ta hi/ hatadza tsa Te/ hata da s+pha ra dze/ ha ta bi phur dza/
213b3(mdo sde): tsata brdza sa te/ ha ta u pa gas te/ ha ta ro ga ra hrI/ ha tA ro ga ra sh+tsa/ ha tad rma sa na/ ha ta sajon sa ta/ drA/ drA/ hA/ dza/ d+hA/ dz+nyA/ sarba mArmadza dzA/ e Shon tata sang sa ra
213b4(mdo sde): khe swA hA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tsam pa ka'i mdog des/ bdag chas pa'i dus kyi tshe/ bsrung ba'i slad du nyi ma'i spyan pad+ma'i gzungs sngags gsal ba
213b5(mdo sde): ni 'di lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas/ tshe dang ldan pa snyan pa la bka' stsal pa/ snyan pa khyod kyis nyi ma'i snying po'i spyan pad+ma'i gzungs sngags
213b6(mdo sde): 'di zung zhig/ snyan pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ba rnyed par dka' 'o// de bas kyang nyi ma'i spyan pad+mar gzungs
213b7(mdo sde): sngags 'od ches rnyed par dka' 'o// rogs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyis kyang rung / gang gos kyang ro'i rgyal po ri rab bas/ rgya mtsho chen po'i yon tan dang /
214a1(mdo sde): pan yon brjod par nus so// nyas spun bar gzungs sngags 'da'i yon tan dang lan yon na bkal ba 'am/ bskal pa las lhag par yang rung ste/ brjod par ma
214a2(mdo sde): nus so// nyi ma'i spyan pad+ma'i gzungs sngags 'di ni de ltar zab po yin no// rogs kyi bu khyed kyis nyi ma'i spyan pad+ma'i gzungs sngags 'di zung zhig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ 'khor bzhi po dag
214a3(mdo sde): la yang rgyas par yang dag par rab tu ston cig dang / der sems can rnams 'dod pa'i 'dod chags thams cad spong bar 'gyur zhes bya ba nas/ zag pa thams cad zad pa dang / byang grol gyi bde ba dang ldan
214a4(mdo sde): pa'i bar du yang 'gyur ro// de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dang yos kyi glang po ches 'di skad ces gsol to// shing gi rgyal po'i drung du bdud ni gtsug pu khyod kyis bcom// byang chub rab mchog dam pa yang
214a5(mdo sde): ni gcig pus brnyes pa lags// lha dang mi dang gnod sbyin gcig pu khyod kyis dbang du mdzad// rgyal ba nyi ma rab grol ye shes mchog gi 'od zer lags// 'di na mu stegs gzhan ni gcig pu 'od
214a6(mdo sde): dang bral mdzad pa// 'jig rten kun na srin bu me khyer dag la nyi ltar mdzes// thub pa 'dus na sems can bsgral ba'i don kyang mdzad lags te// dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung dang chos tshul
214a7(mdo sde): yun ring gnas par mdzad// khyod gcig pu la mchod phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams lhags pa// dge dang byang chub yongs su brtsam byor chos don gnyer ba lags// rgyal ba khyod ni sdug bsngal
214b1(mdo sde): mas ca da pa cos ston pa// khyod ni lce shes kyang nub spyod pa rab co bston par ba na// gcig bras mo skar bdud rgyas sems can rnams kyang gi mang pa// yang srid ma bcis ya mang po
214b2(mdo sde): chags khrag khrig sgrol ba khyod// zab bzang cing lta dang bral po can mongs sbyangs gyur pa// gang na mya ngan byed med zhi ba'i grong khyer gshegs pa khyod// 'di ni 'jig rten kun tu khyod gcig sman dang mdzung /
214b3(mdo sde): lags te// rgyal ba rnams kyis khyod la zhu ba'i slang du po nyar mngags// rig pa'i rgya ma tshe thugs rje mnyam pas gnas par mdzad pa po// thub pa zla ba chos dang gsan nas gzungs kyang bskur ba lags/
214b4(mdo sde): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das lho phyogs na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas dpe bgyi na/ grong khyer rgyar dpag tshad tsam mchis pa/ bye mas bltam pa de snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag 'das pa nas/ sngogs ma lnga/
214b5(mdo sde): dang ldan badren/ 'jig rten gyi khams sogs pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bgyib mchis te/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang rgyal po zhes bgyi ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho 'di gzhes la chos kyang ston to//
214b6(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa des bdag 'dir mngags lags te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de khyod nyi ma'i sdong po'i chos kyis gnas pa/ glu'i yul rnam par 'jig par mdzad pa'i 'od zer gyi le'u sems
214b7(mdo sde): can rnams kyi las 'byung ba'i gzungs sngags 'di 'chad pa la dad pa sbyin par mdzad cing / gnod pa chung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes
215a1(mdo sde): kyang zhu bar mdzad lags na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ci spun mi mnga' lags sam gnod pa chung lags sam/ khyod kyi 'khor bro 'tshal ba ma mchis sas
215a2(mdo sde): gnod pa chung lags sam/ dam pa'i chos nyan par 'tshal ba dag lags sam/ ji ltar chos thos pa bzhin du chos de la nan tan snying por bgyid pa dag lags sam/ chos kyi gnas pas
215a3(mdo sde): gnas par bgyid lags sam/ khyod kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na/ bdud kyi yul dang / gru'i yul bcom lags sam/ khyod kyi sangs rgyas kyi yul gcig pu lags sam/ 'di na
215a4(mdo sde): thogs pa ma mchis par chos kyi 'khor lo bskor lags sam/ sangs rgyas kyi yul 'di na/ gang su dag 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur ba de dag gi don du/ de bzhin gshegs pa ri dbang rgyal
215a5(mdo sde): po de khyod dang nyi ma'i snying po'i chos kyis gnas pa/ klu'i yul rnam par 'jig pa'i 'od zer gyi le'u sems can rnams kyi las 'byang ba'i gzungs sngags 'di la dad pa sbyin par mdzad lags
215a6(mdo sde): so// de nas stong pa nyid dang rjes su 'thun pa'i gzungs sngags mthu che ba phan yon che ba/ 'dod pa'i 'dod chags thams cad zad par bgyid pa gzugs kyi 'dod chags thams
215a7(mdo sde): cad dang / gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags thams cad zad par bgyid pa/ nga rgyal dang / lhag pa'i nga rgyal dang / nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal thams cad zad par bgyid pa zhes bgyi ba nas
215b1(mdo sde): ltar rdzu ba gang pa' bar dang / sdug bsngal gyi khur 'dor bar bgyid pa'i bar 'ang yang bskur lag t+te/ taH thA/ d+hus te/ dus te/ a g+sa rgyus te/ byas/ rnam te
215b2(mdo sde): sarbAk+Sha sha/ d+hun te/ a he Sh+mA b+h+rU~M/ bim ta Sha \u0f89\u0fa4 mo hA laHan n+ya b+h+ya gyibu thong ti laH/ sa ma.a nemalo tsan+da ShaH
215b3(mdo sde): khak+Sh+ma/ ba ti ma ra kha g+ha/ u k+ko ma kha g+ha/ u ra kha g+hA/ ak+ki kha b+ha/ ya pad ma no la b+ha/ rU pa la b+ha/ ya bad bidz+nyA na lag+ha/ tsak+Shu d+hA du Sha b+hA/ ya pad ma no ba dz+rA na d+hA dra kha d+ha
215b4(mdo sde): pr-i tho bid+yA ta kha D+ha/ ya ba bad dz+nyA na d+hA tu kha d+hatsa tu sbrid t+yu ba s+thA na kha b+ha/ ya pad a bo ni ka kha g+ha/ du kha kha b+ha/ yA bad man kha g+ha/ bi ba ba/ na bik+ka ba/ a nan/ sa sa mud tra na na/
215b5(mdo sde): sarba ka rA Na na/ sarba sad ldan bi shrI ba nAn/ A kan tsan na ne/ klu b+hA k+sha/ i le oM i le/ oM i le/ mi le swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang rgyal pos
215b6(mdo sde): khyod la stong pa nyid dang rjes su 'thun pa'i gzungs sngags bskur ba ni 'di lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas legs so zhes bya ba gnang ngo // sangs rgyas zhing mi mjed du thams
215b7(mdo sde): cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor lhags pas kyang legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ bsam gtan dang ldan pa dag ni ma gtogs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
216a1(mdo sde): chen po spos kyi glang po che la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu 'di rang stan 'di nyid la bzhugs bzhin du sems can rnams la don dang bcas pa/ tshig 'bru dang
216a2(mdo sde): bcas pa lhag chad med pa'i stong pa nyid dang rjes su 'thun pa'i gzungs sngags rgya cher smyon par mdzad do// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ri dbang rgyal pos/ gang khyod 'dir 'ong ba'i tshe bsrung ba'i
216a3(mdo sde): phyir byin pa mi zad pa'i sbubs kyi lung bstan pa/ sems can rnams kyi sems dang tshor ba bsgrubs pa yang dag par 'du ba thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob pa dang / bdud bzhi 'dul ba sgrub pa'i
216a4(mdo sde): gnas dang / chos kyi tshul dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung sgrub pa mi zad pa'i sbubs kyi lung bstan pa'i bar de khyod kyis kyang ston cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
216a5(mdo sde): spos kyi glang po ches 'di skad ces gsol to// tad+ya thA/ sha ra Na bya ya/ shik+ka byA ya/ smr-i ti bya ya/ pra ha na bya ya/ ring nga bya ya/ oMn dri ya bya ya/ ba la byA ya/ bo d+h+yang ga bya la/
216a6(mdo sde): sa mA d+hI byA ya/ d+ha ra ni bya ya/ krAn ti bya ya/ d+h+yan ni bya ya/ a rU pa bya ya/ A ni ni dza bya ya/ mA rba bya ya/ a badz+nyA bya ya/ pra ti sam bi ta bya ya/ b+hU maM bya ya/ bod du bya ya/
216a7(mdo sde): ma ma d+hi bya ma/ macwa ga dun byas thod hos bya y-i/ bya ya/ rnam byal/ sa byas/ A la ka byal/ prata byas bya yi/ ba ti kra rung 'a byal/ gzhan bya la/ mar byal/ shA
216b1(mdo sde): rgyal padz+ra la/ a Ni ti byus/ a na ma t+yA byas/ ruta h+ya / ga 5/ a kon can 5/ a bas/ A nar+tha/ man na/ a4\u0f7f/ tsan ra/ tsan na ra wa/ tsatsa
216b2(mdo sde): tsan+da ra bi mu/ b+ha ya/ bi su/ kU ya bi mu/ A pa bya ya bi mu/ a sa mud tsa ra bi mu/ ts+tshed bi mu/ A kA sha bi muka b+hu ba sha ma bi mu/ a nA b+ha sa bi mu/ a ha ha bi mu/ a pA ra bi mu u
216b3(mdo sde): pa shams l-i la bi mu swA hA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dbang rgyal po des bdag chas pa'i dus kyi tshe/ bdag bsrung ba'i slad du mi zad pa'i sbubs kyi gzungs sngags
216b4(mdo sde): btsal ba ni 'di lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun shes ko'u di n+yal bka' stsal pa/ ko'u di n+ya khyod kyis mi zad pa'i sbubs kyi gzungs
216b5(mdo sde): sngags 'di zung zhig/ ko ru da n+ya de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ba rnyed par dka' 'o// de bas kyang mi zad pa'i sbubs kyi lung bstan pa 'di ches rnyed par dka' 'o//
216b6(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyis kyang rung / bskal pa brgya stong gi sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi skad cig bgrang bar nus so// gang dag mi zad par
216b7(mdo sde): sbubs kyi gzungs sngags 'dir mun pa med par 'dug pas grugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos sa 'dres pa bco brgyad po de dag ni gang gis kyang bzang bar mi nus so// ko rung kya de lta bas nas 'ang
217a1(mdo sde): pa'i sbubs kyi lung bstan pa'i chos 'di ji ltar thos pa 'khor bzhi po dag la yang rgyas par dag par rab tu ston cig dang / de dag chos de thos pas las thams cad zad pa
217a2(mdo sde): thob par 'gyur ba nas/ spobs pa thogs pa med pa dag dang / spobs pa gcad du med pa dag dang / spobs pa rgyun mi chad pa'i bar dag thob par 'gyur zhing / khams gsum las khyad par du
217a3(mdo sde): 'phags pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dag tu 'ang 'gyur ro// yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snang ba'i snying po dpal de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ga la ba de logs su
217a4(mdo sde): thal mo sbyar ba rab tu btud nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to// 'gro drug sdug bsngal gyis khrid cing // nyon mongs nad kyis kun tu g.yengs// khyod ni mkhas pa mgon
217a5(mdo sde): gyur khyod/ brgal nas 'gro ba sgrol mdzad khyod// dbang po drug la rmongs gyur cing // bdud kyi zhags pas nyen zin la// yang dag lam ni ston pa khyod// 'jig rten na ni rab rnyed dka'/
217a6(mdo sde): yan lag drug ldan khyim gyi gzhi// mkhas pa'i mi los spangs pa lags// khyod ni 'jig rten kun gyi gnyen// chos kyi mu ge 'jog mdzad pa// mngon shes drug ldan sgom chen lags// bden
217a7(mdo sde): pa gsung bzang srong che// sems can 'khor bar zhugs pa rnams// 'ching ba das las sgrol mdzad khyod// khyod kyi sngags la dad nas su// shing 'dir yang ni lhags pa lags// 'dir ni
217b1(mdo sde): 'dug rten mgan pa las/ bangagazag po ny+dzar ma gas kyis gson// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nub phyogs na sangs rgyas kyi shing ga'i lung bzhi bcu cu gnas kyi bye ma snyed 'das nas// den
217b2(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams stong po'i tshul mtshan zhes bgyi ba mchis so// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes dpal brtsegs rgyal po zhes bgyi ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la
217b3(mdo sde): chos kyang ston to// de bzhin gshegs pa des bdag sangs rgyas kyi khyong 'dir mngags lags te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de khyod nyi ma'i snying po'i chos kyis gnas pa/ gru'i yul rnam par 'jog par
217b4(mdo sde): mdzad pa'i 'od zer gyi le'u/ sems can rnams kyi las 'brang ba'i gzungs sngags 'di 'chad pa la dad pa sbyin par mdzad cing / gnod pa chung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang bde ba la
217b5(mdo sde): reg par gnas sam zhes kyang 'dri bar mdzad lags na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ci spun mi mnga' lags sam/ gnod pa chung lags sam/ khyod kyi 'khor bro 'tshal ba ma mchis sam/
217b6(mdo sde): gnod pa chung lags sam/ dam pa'i chos nyan par 'tshal ba lags sam/ ji ltar chos rjes su thos pa bzhin du yang chos de la nan tan snying por bgyod pa dag lags sam/ chos kyi gnas pas
217b7(mdo sde): gnas par bgyid lags sam/ khyod kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na bdud kyi yul dang / gru'i yul bcom lags sam/ khyod kyi sangs rgyas kyi yul gcig pu lags sam/ 'di na thogs
218a1(mdo sde): bkusas par 'khor la bskor lagasasas/ sangs rgyas pa zhing 'din gang su ga 'khor lo kor bar 'gyur ba de dag ga don du de bzhin gshegs pa pa shes dpal brtsegs/
218a2(mdo sde): rgyal po de khyod dang ni ma'i snying po'i chos kyis gnas pa/ klu'i yul rnam par 'jog par mdzad pa'i 'od zer gyi le'u sems can rnams kyi las 'byung ba'i gzungs sngags 'di la dad pa sbyin par mdzad
218a3(mdo sde): lags so// de nas smon pa med pa'i rjes su 'thun pa'i gzungs sngags mthu che ba/ phan yon che ba/ 'dod pa'i 'dod chags thams cad yang dag par zad par bgyid pa/ gzugs kyi 'dod
218a4(mdo sde): chags thams cad dang gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags thams cad yang dag par zad par bgyid pa/ nga rgyal dang / lhag pa'i nga rgyal dang / nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal thams cad yang dag par
218a5(mdo sde): zad par bgyid pa 'di yang bskur lags te zhes bgyid pa nas/ ma rig pa'i mun pa'i phung po thams cad rab tu 'joms par bgyod pa/ sdug bsngal gyi khur 'dor bar bgyid pa zhes bgyi ba'i bar du ji
218a6(mdo sde): ltar sngar bshad pa bzhin no// tad+yathA/ shA na sha ra/ sha man sha ba/ a bak+ka ba sha/ tsak+Shu b+ha ba shab/ shro tra sha ba/ g+hA Na sha ba/ dzi swA sha ba/
218a7(mdo sde): kA ya sha ba mA na sha ba k+Sha ta bod d+ya tsak+ku/ pr-i ti bi k+sa b+ha/ shro tA A bAk+sha b+ha/ dzi hA bA yuk+ka b+ha ma na o dza k+ka b+ha/ a lo ka dz+nyA na k+ka b+ha/ bA dza sang gra ma k+ka b+ha/ a
218b1(mdo sde): / Sh+Ta/ / / na sa
218b2(mdo sde): dul s+ya swAd+ha/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes dpal brtsegs rgyal po des smon pa med pa'i rjes su 'thun pa'i gzungs sngags bskur ba ni 'di lags so//
218b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang legs so zhes bya ba gnang ngo // bsam gtan dang ldan pa rnams ma gtogs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed kyi nang du gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad
218b4(mdo sde): dang ldan pa rnams kyis kyang legs so zhes bya ba byin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snang ba'i snying po dpal la 'di skad ces
218b5(mdo sde): bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu stan 'di nyid la bzhugs bzhin du sems can rnams la don bzang po tshig 'bru bzang po lhag chad med pa smon pa med pa dang rjes su 'thun pa'i gzungs
218b6(mdo sde): sngags 'di rgya cher ston par mdzad de// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes dpal brtsegs rgyal pos/ gang khyod la 'dir 'ong ba'i tshe byin pa rig sngags kyi rten gyi lung bstan
218b7(mdo sde): pa de khyod kyis kyang ston cig/ lung bstan pa des ni 'dir sems can rnams kyi sred pa chung ngu dang / 'bring dang / chen po nyon mongs pa srid pa'i rgyu rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro//
219a1(mdo sde): bzhin du gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i nyon mongs pa srid pa'i rgyu rnams zhi bar 'gyur ro// bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang bsnyil bar 'gyur ro// las 'byung /
219a2(mdo sde): ba dang / dge ba'i phyogs thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i bar du yang 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin te/ bstan par bgyi lags so// tad+ya thA/ be g+ha pa
219a3(mdo sde): ri Te / gar+tha sa k+sha sa/ gar+b+ha re bid drA pra b+ha gak+kek+ka la lo ge pra ta pA ra sha man na si ka Te/ sa ma me kA dza~M Sha.a k+ka yan te/ kra b+ha ga nang d+ha dza She/ sa sranaH/
219a4(mdo sde): ad+ya sha ya dz+haSha bi pra badz+haSha/ shek+ka dza Sha/ se n+ya dza ba d+haShe/ sa li la bu h+yadz+ha She/ sa la gu h+ya be kli ba na ko she/ sa d+han ko no sA bi dA nan bye/ bi ta zid te
219a5(mdo sde): u pa kra ma pa the/ a nA ts+tshe d+ya pra khe/ pra ti kra me Na/ sa khang th+ya shai sa lo tsa na ba me/ kro d+ha d+ha re/ kA mA sa she/ A kA sha kha ge na g+ha kun ts+tshe/ bid d+yA ba ne kA na ba ne u tsa ba ne
219a6(mdo sde): sa ma ma ka re/ sha ri ya ba ne/ mo b+ha dza be/ ha ri ko na ba/ na ya na mu khe/ sA rak+ka ko le/ nA rA yu dzu re/ in dra bA sa maM/ oM a/ a ba a/ a ra ba a/ ba rA/ A ba
219a7(mdo sde): chas me b+ha du Sha ni sti ra ni ni rba he swA hA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes dpal brtsegs rgyal po des/ bdag chas pa'i dus kyi tshe bsrung ba'i slad du rig sngags kyi rten gyi/
219b1(mdo sde): rlung brtan stsal ban 'di lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shas thub pas/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra'i bral bka'aphrul pa/ shAr ba tor su/ khyod kyas/
219b2(mdo sde): rog sngags kyi rten gyi gzungs sngags 'di zung zhig/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ba rnyed par dka'a'o// de bas
219b3(mdo sde): kyang rig sngags kyi rten gyi gzungs sngags 'di ches rnyed par dgaka' 'o// shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyis kyang rung bskal po brgyas khring bag pa'i 'jig rten
219b4(mdo sde): gyi khams kyi sa'i khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab rnams bzang ba 'am/ mtha' rtogs par nus so// rig sngags kyi rten gyi gzungs sngags 'di'i mtha' ni bskal pa brgya stong gis kyang brjod par ma/
219b5(mdo sde): nus so// rig sngags kyi rten gyi lung bstan pa 'di ni de ltar zab pa yin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bu khyod kyis rig sngags 'di yang zung zhig/ kun chub par byos shig/ 'khor bzhi po
219b6(mdo sde): ngag la yang rgyas par ston cig/ yang dag par rab tu ston cig dang / de thos pas kyang sems can de dag gi sred pa chung ngu dang / 'bring dang / chen po srid pa'i rgyu rnams dang /
219b7(mdo sde): gzugs dang / gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa srid pa'i rgyu rnams rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang rgyab kyis phyogs par 'gyur ro// bud med/
220a1(mdo sde): mtshams med pa byed pa'i las kyi sgrib pa srid pa'i rgyu rnams zad par 'gyur zhing / lhag ma med pa'i bar du yang 'gyur ro// zag pa thams cad zad pa dang / byang grol
220a2(mdo sde): gyi bde ba dang ldan pa'i bar du yang 'gyur ro// yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba rab tu btud nas/
220a3(mdo sde): de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to// khyod ni ded dpon gcig pu lags// chos rnams kun la nges pa ste// mthong ba'i gus pa skyes pa yin// bshes gnyen dpal yang nye bar
220a4(mdo sde): 'dzin// me tog gcig dang bdug pa yos// de bzhin gshegs pa mchod bgyis na// yan lag kun gyi mchog ldan pa'i// bshes gnyen sdug pa nye bar 'dzin// tshogs ni chen po bsdus
220a5(mdo sde): pa yang // dus gcig tu ni 'dir mdzad pas// lha rnams thams cad bsngags bgyid cing // bshes gnyen dpal yang nye bar 'dzin// der ni 'jig rten mgon po yis// 'di ni lan cig kho na
220a6(mdo sde): bstan// rtag tu lha min shes rab ldan// bshes gnyen dpal yang nye bar 'dzin// dpal gyi me tog stong po ni/ dpal rnams kun gyis kun tu brgyan// de'i sa shAkya'i dpal zhu bar/
220a7(mdo sde): bdag cag po har mngags pa lags// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang phyogs kyi phyogs chan/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung brgyad nu'i bye ma snyed 'das nas
220b1(mdo sde): rdzogs pa lngang nga ldan pa de na 'jig rten gyi khams thos thams cad yang dag par 'phags pa zhes bgyi ba mchis so// sangs rnas kyi gang den de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
220b2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas dpal me tog gi snying po zhes bgyi ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to// de bzhin gshegs pa des bdag 'dir mngags lags te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de khyod nyim
220b3(mdo sde): snying po'i chos kyis gnas pa/ klu'i yul rnam par 'jog par mdzad pa'i 'od zer gyi le'u sems can rnams kyi las 'byang ba gzungs sngag 'di 'chad pa la dad pa sbyin par mdzad cing / gnod pa chung
220b4(mdo sde): ngam bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes kyang zhu bar mdzad lags na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ci spun mi mnga' lags sam/ gnod pa chung lags sam/
220b5(mdo sde): khyod kyi 'khor bro 'tshal ba ma mchis sam/ gnod pa chung lags sam/ dam pa'i chos nyan par 'tshal ba dag lags sam/ ji ltar chos rjes su thos pa bzhin du/ chos de la nan tan
220b6(mdo sde): snying por bgyid pa lags sam/ chos kyis gnas pas gnas par bgyid lags sam/ khyod kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na/ bdud kyi yul dang / klu'i yul bcom lags
220b7(mdo sde): sam khyod kyi sangs rgyas kyi yul gcig pu lags sam/ 'di na thogs pa ma mchis par chos kyi 'khor lo bskor lags sam sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'din gang su dga' bor/
221a1(mdo sde): lo sor bar 'gyur ba de dag gi don du de bzhin gshegs pa dpal me tog gi sdong po de khyod dang nyi ma'i snying po chos kyis gnas pa klu'i yul rnam par 'jog pa'i 'od
221a2(mdo sde): zer gyi le'u sems can rnams kyi las 'byung ba'i gzus sngags 'od la dad pa sbyin par mdzad lags so// de nas zhi ba rig pa mchis pa'i sbubs su zhi ba'i gzungs sngags mthu che ba/
221a3(mdo sde): phan yon che ba/ sems can thams cad la phan par bgyid pa nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa nyon mongs pa thams cad 'dul bar bgyid pa phung po dang skye mched thams
221a4(mdo sde): cad yongs su shes par bgyid pa/ chos thams cad rnam par 'byed par bgyid pa/ thabs thams cad yang dag par ston par bgyod pa/ byang grol gyi bde ba thams cad yongs su
221a5(mdo sde): myong bar bgyid pa/ sems can thams cad rab tu dad par bgyid pa/ chos thams cad kyi bde ba la 'jug par bgyid pa/ bdud dang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad chos dang 'thun par
221a6(mdo sde): tshar gcod par bgyid pa/ bdud kyi yul thams cad rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa 'di yang bskur lags te/ rig pa mchis pa'i sbubs zhi ba lung bstan pa chen po 'di ni/ bdud
221a7(mdo sde): rnams char gcod par bgyid pa/ phas kyi rgol ba rnams pham par bgyid pa/ lha rnams dge' bar bgyid pa/ gnod sbyin rnams yang dag par mgu bar bgyid pa/ lha ma yin
221b1(mdo sde): rnams rnam par 'joms par bgying ba/ nam mkha' lding rnams yang dag par mgu bar bgyid pa/ mi 'am ci rnams dad par bgyid pa lto 'phye chen po rnams rgyab kyis phyogs par bgyid
221b2(mdo sde): phas kyi rgol pa rnams 'dul bar bgyid pa/ rgyal rigs rnams mngon par dga' bar bgyid pa/ zas ze rnams 'jug par bgyid pa/ rde'u rnams rab tu 'joms par bgyid pa/
221b3(mdo sde): dmangs rigs rnams mchog tu dga' bar bgyid pa bud med 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyid pa bud med sbrum pa bde legs su yongs su thar par bgyid pa mang du thos pa rnams
221b4(mdo sde): dran par bgyid pa/ rnal 'byor spyod pa rnams mngon par dga' bar bgyid pa nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa 'thab pa dang 'thab mo dang mu ge dang
221b5(mdo sde): 'chings dang / nad dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang / char pa dang / chu bo dang / zang ba dang / dro ba dang / kha ba dang / tsha ba dang /
221b6(mdo sde): rtsub pa dang / zung hrung po dang / 'dus te reg par dka' ba rnams rnam par zhi bar bgyid pa/ chos kyi tshul 'bar bar bgyid pa/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa rton par bgyid pa
221b7(mdo sde): dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi gcad par bgyid pa/ 'khor bas sbas pa rnams dbugs 'byon par bgyid pa/ zad pa shes pa skyed par bgyid pa/ mi skye ba shes pa rang gi mngon
222a1(mdo sde): sum du bcang ba/ mun pa'i phung po rnam par 'jig par bgying ba/ sdug bsngal gyi khur 'dor bar bzod pa/ man+t+ra che ba lags so// tad+ya thAsanas/
222a2(mdo sde): An// zas k+tha/ dza laH/ ma naka/ \u0f88\u0f90\u0f7f\u0f7f/ san d+hAH/ rma Da ra hu bi swanaT/ kha ga nA Ta/ aT na Ta/ ku na Ta/ pa raM kus nAT/ naT naT/ su ri ka na Ta/
222a3(mdo sde): u Ta ra naMT/ ka bi nAT/ kun dza naT/ a ma kha nA Ta/ tsa ba me b+ha nA Ta/ puk+ka ra nA Ta/ hi sa dutA na Ta/ sa mA la yA nAT/ she ra ku mang ko'u ta Ta/ mA tu gu ra ba/ tre suk+kA ba ni ra
222a4(mdo sde): dzu/ dA na ma rA dzu'u/ ba b+ha na pu te/ san tI ra ba dza ba/ ma ho ra ga dz+wa lA/ a tri Na/ a tri Na/ a tr-i Na/ na ba/ a tr-i NA ka?/ a ba ha mA rbA tri nak+Shu/ e shod tro du kha b+hA ra s+ye sA hA/
222a5(mdo sde): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dpal me tog gi snying pos rig pa mchis pa'i sbubs zhi ba lung bstan pa chen po mthu che ba/ phan yon che ba 'di bskur
222a6(mdo sde): lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas legs so zhes bya ba gnang ngo // bsam gtan la brtson pa rnams ma gtogs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed du lhags pa'i sam
222a7(mdo sde): can thams cad dang ldan pa rnams kyis kyang legs so zhes bya ba byin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po la 'di skad ces
222b1(mdo sde): bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu stan 'di nyid la bzhugs bzhin du sems can rnams la rig pa yod pa'i sbubs zhi ba'i gzungs sngags don dang bcas pa/ tshig 'bru dang bcas pa/ lhag chang
222b2(mdo sde): med pa 'di rgya cher ston par mdzad do// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa dpal me tog gi snying po nges/ gang khyod chas pa'i dus kyi tshe/ gsang sngags gang dag gis ldang ba thams cad dang bar 'gyur/
222b3(mdo sde): ba'i gzungs sngags sdang ba zhi bar byed pa dang / gnyid kyis log par byed pa/ dmigs pa med pa'i tshangs pa'i gnas pa'i rgyu 'thun pa byin pa de khyod kyis kyang ston cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
222b4(mdo sde): de bzhin du bstan par bgyi lags so// tad+ya thA/ zo br-i ha/ bu bu ra/ ta la ra ba/ i la sa ha/ ha Tu ha Tu/ ga ga na k+ka/ sha ma mi ta tra/ tsakra brti/ ti le/ sa ga ra ti le/ dU na hi le/ hi le
222b5(mdo sde): phab he/ na ra dza te/ ya ba na mi tre/ krI ti mi tre/ b+ha ra mid tre/ shi khi ming tre/ ma ru ta mid tre/ kha ga mid tre/ sarbo dzA ming tre/ sarbA ga ma mid tre/ ma nA ma ru mid tre/ d+hA tu shwa ra ming tre sA hA/
222b6(mdo sde): kye byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying pos ldang bzhi bar byed pa/ gnyid kyis log par byed pa'i bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ sdang ba'i sbrul thams cad rang gi gnas su
222b7(mdo sde): dong nas/ gnyid kyis log par gyur te/ gang zag bzod pa thob pa rnams dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa rnams ni ma gtogs so//
223a1(mdo sde): srid pa na gang dag sdang ba'i gnod sbyin rnams dang / gang dag sdang ba'i lha ma yin rnams dang zhes bya ba nas/ sdang ba'i nam mkha' lding rnams zhes bya ba'i bar dang /
223a2(mdo sde): sdang ba'i mi 'am ci rnams zhes bya ba'i bar dang / yi dgas rnams zhes bya ba'i bar dang / sha za rnams zhes bya ba'i bar dang / srul po rnams zhes bya ba'i bar dang / gang dag sdang
223a3(mdo sde): pa'i lus srul po rnams zhes bya ba'i bar de dag rang gi gnas su dong nas/ gnyid kyis log par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa thob pa rnams dang / phyir mi ldog pa rnams ni ma
223a4(mdo sde): gtogs so// gang dag sdang ba'i mi gzu lums can dang / rtsub pa dang / snying brtse ba med pa dang / phan tshun mi 'thun pa dang / rtag tu khro ba spyod pa dang / 'jig rten pha rol gyis 'jigs
223a5(mdo sde): par mi lta ba dang / mtshams med pa byed pa dang / dam pa'i chos spong bar byed pa dang / 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa dang / mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa de dag kyang sdang bzhi
223a6(mdo sde): bar byed pa/ gnyid kyis log par byed pa'i bstan pa 'di thos pas/ thams cad mchog tu byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa dag dang snying rje'i sems dang ldan pa dag dang / snying
223a7(mdo sde): brtse ba'i sems dang ldan pa dag dang / khon med pa'i sems dang ldan pa dag dang / mi 'khrugs pa'i sems dang ldan pa dag dang chos la dmigs pa'i sems dang ldan pa dag dang /
223b1(mdo sde): 'jig rten pha rol gyis 'jigs pa'i sems dang ldan pa dag dang / dkon mchog gsum la lhag par gus pa'i sems dang ldan pa dag dang / chos la dmigs pa'i sems dang ldan pa dag dang /
223b2(mdo sde): zhi ba'i sems dang ldan pa dag tu gnas par gyur to// gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dpal me tog gi stong po des bdag chas pa'i tshe/ bsrung ba'i slad du/
223b3(mdo sde): gang sdang bzhi par bgying ba'i gzungs sngags de stsal ba ni 'di lags so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu la bka' stsal pa/ mo'u
223b4(mdo sde): 'gal gyi bu khyod kyis sdang ba zhi bar byed pa/ gnyid kyis log par byed pa'i gzungs sngags dmigs pa med pa'i tshangs pa'i gnas pa'i rgyu 'thun pa 'di zung zhig mo'u 'gal gyi bu de
223b5(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ba rnyed par dka' 'o// de bas kyang sdang ba zhi bar byed pa/ gnyid kyis log par byed pa'i
223b6(mdo sde): gzungs sngags dmigs pa med pa'i tshangs pa'i gnas pa'i rgyu 'thun pa 'di ches rnyed par dka' 'o// mo'u 'gal gyi bu sdang ba zhi bar byed pa gnyid kyis log par byed pa 'di ni bskal
223b7(mdo sde): pa brgya stong du las gzhan mi byed par bstan kyang lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang / za na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa la gnas pa rnams kyis kyang rung / gang
224a1(mdo sde): gos kyang don gzung bar mi nus so// de bzhin gshegs pa nyid ni ma gtogs te/ de ltar bab cing de ltar don che ba yon la/ de ltar phan yon che ba yin no// bla na med pa
224a2(mdo sde): yayang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam dang bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin zhing / sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i snying rje chen po yang thob par byed pa'o// mo'u 'gal gyi bu de lta
224a3(mdo sde): bas na sdang ba zhi bar byed pa/ gnyid kyis log par byed pa'i gzungs sngags 'di zung zhig/ dus dus su sems can rnams la rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston cig/ sems can gang dag
224a4(mdo sde): nyan par byed pa de dag kyang thos pa tsam gyis yon tan dang phan yon mang po thob par 'gyur ro// khro ba mang pos mi 'dod pa myong bar 'gyur ba las kyi rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu
224a5(mdo sde): rnams med par 'gyur ro// mi snang bar 'gyur ro// 'khor ba'i skyon mang po rnam par shes par 'gyur ro// dge ba'i rtsa ba mang po skyed par 'gyur ro// bsod nams mang po so sor 'dzin
224a6(mdo sde): par byed do// dge ba'i bshes gnyen mang po la ston par byed do// spen par byed do// bsnyen bkur byed do// des na de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog
224a7(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro// mo'u 'gal gyi bu gzungs sngags 'di ni chos kyi mar me 'bar bar byed pa dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung mi chad par byed pa yin no// 'dus pa chen po theg pa chen po'i mdo
224b1(mdo sde): ma'i snying po'i le'u las/ gzungs skyugs kyi le'u ste gsum mo// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ pho nya bzhi po de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
224b2(mdo sde): gzhan dag la yang bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir rang rang gi dge ba'i phyogs kyi sa la gnas par byos shog/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
224b3(mdo sde): de dag 'khor dang bcas te/ gnas ji lta ba bzhin du sgrol mo grang gos 'khod nas ji ltar 'tsham pa bzhin du bzod pa'i gzungs la snyoms par 'jug pa shin tu bsgoms pa dag gis snyoms
224b4(mdo sde): par zhugs so// snyoms par zhugs pa de dag kha cig gi lus las 'od 'di lta bu byung ste/ dper na 'bru mar gyi mar me bzhin no// kha cig gi ni dper na zla ba dang nyi ma bye ba brgya stong gi 'od
224b5(mdo sde): bzhon pa'i bar du'o// yang de'i tshe rje dang ldan pa kun shes koT da rgyu 'di snyam du sems te/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la
224b6(mdo sde): bdag gis khu ba ji lta bus de bzhin gshegs pa gzungs sngags bzhi po thams cad rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston par mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed du ji ltar lpags pa'i
224b7(mdo sde): sems can rnam pa nyan par byed pa dang / the tsom thams cad spong bar 'gyur ba dang / chos thams cad la sdang bzab pa dang / lhang mo dang bral ba dang ga mas nyi las nal cing bcos
225a1(mdo sde): las rgal bar 'gyur ba dang / mur du skyon med par 'jug pa dang / log par mi lung ba'i chos can dang / mtho ros la gzhol bar 'gyur ba de lta bur zhu bar bya'o snyam mo//
225a2(mdo sde): de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun shes ko 'ung rgya bcom ldan 'das ka la ba de logs su bral mo sbyar ba rab tu btung nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rje
225a3(mdo sde): dang ldan pa kun shes ko'u di n+yal bka' stsal pa/ ko'u n+ya ci de bzhin gshegs pa la khyod zhu ba zhu bar 'dod dam/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin no// btsun pa bde
225a4(mdo sde): babar gshegs pa de bzhin te/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te zhu ba zhus pa lung bstan pa'i slad du/ bdag la skabs phye na/ btsun pa de bzhin gshegs pa la bdag zhu ba 'ga' zhig zhu
225a5(mdo sde): lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u di n+ya de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la khyod gang dang gang 'dod pa zhus shig dang /
225a6(mdo sde): ngas zhu ba zhus pa de dang de lung bstan pas/ ji ltar lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis mngon sum du gyur pa ltar/ khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang
225a7(mdo sde): ldan pa kun shes ko'u de rgyas 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gang zag gi bla ni sred pa'o// zla ni sred pa'o zhes gsungs lags na ji tsam gyis de bzhin
225b1(mdo sde): gshegs pa gang zag ga tha med pa lags par 'dogs pas 'dogs par mdzadu lags/ ji skad du de bzhin gshegs pas skyes bu'i rtswa med pa ni yun rang por yang dang yang 'khor zhing / nga
225b2(mdo sde): dang yang mngal len par byed do zhes gsu su lags s+ho// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal bya/ ko nang n+ya gang khyod spyi bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo bang po la bde ba'i phyir lus gang /
225b3(mdo sde): dus dang 'tsham par zhu ba zhus pa legs so legs so// ko'u di n+ya de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhog dang ngas bshad do// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin no zhes gsol/
225b4(mdo sde): nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun shes ko'u nga n+ya bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ko'u de n+ya sred pa zhes bya ba ni sred pa gsum mo//
225b5(mdo sde): gsum gang zhe na/ 'dod pa'i sred pa dang / gzugs kyi sred pa dang / gzugs med pa'i med pa'o// / 'phags pa shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i sde nyi ma'i stong
225b6(mdo sde): po zhes bya ba'i mdo/ bam po drug pa// gzhan yang sred pa ni gsum ste/ 'byung ba'i sred pa dang / 'jog pa dang / chos kyi med pa'o// ko'u de n+ya de la 'dod pa
225b7(mdo sde): sred pa rnams gang zhe na/ 'dod pa rnams zhes bya ba na/ 'khrig pa dang ldan pa'i spong ba ste/ gang la bag med pa rnams 'dod pa'i bde ba'i sbyor ba la brtson zhing dman pa'i rang
226a1(mdo sde): bzhin can gyi mingadag dga' bar byed cing / sems can rnams 'dod chags kyis yongs su gdung bas gdungs nas/ 'dod chags kun 'byung bas mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi
226a2(mdo sde): lam yang dag par blangs te gnas par byed pa'o// rgyu de dang rkyen des sems can dpral ba rnams snang ngo // dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / gnod sbyin dbul
226a3(mdo sde): po nyid snang ngo // 'dod chags kyi rgyus sems can rnams 'gro ba lnga dang ldan pa'i 'khor bar sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba mi bzad pa/ rtsub pa rnam pa sna tshogs nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro// skrag
226a4(mdo sde): par mi 'gyur ro// de dag ngo tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod pa spangs shing dge ba'i rtsa ba dang bral bas brgya lam na res 'ga' mi nyid rnyed par 'gyur ro// de dag 'dod chags kyi rgyus yang dang
226a5(mdo sde): yang du lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi nyes par spyod pa'i las rnam pa sna tshogs zhes bya ba nas/ mtshams med pa'i las rnams zhes bya ba'i bar kun nas slong bar byed do// de dag yang dang yang
226a6(mdo sde): du dus yun ring por ngan song rnams su tshor ba rtsub pa/ mi bzang pa nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro// thams cad kyang 'dod chags kyi rgyu dang / 'dod chags kyi gzhis 'dod chags kyi bag
226a7(mdo sde): la nyal gyi ltung ba btags pa dag yin te/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa 'dod chags spang ba'i phyir chos ston to// 'dod pa rnams kyi nyes dmigs yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mthong bar
226b1(mdo sde): pad do// mas can de dag 'dod pa rnams kyi nyes dmigs shes nas/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ma mar rtog par byed de/ dper na 'dod pa rnams nam sdug pa dag go/ kis bla kar/
226b2(mdo sde): 'bras bu lta bu dag go// 'dod pa rnams ni me mdag gi phung po lta bu dag go// dug gi bum pa lta bu dag go 'dod pa rnams ni sngam phyis dang 'dra ba dag go// 'dod pa rnams ni spu bri'i so lta
226b3(mdo sde): bu dag go// chom rkun lta bu dag go// gdol pa'i khyim lta bu dag go// lcags kyi thu lum 'bar ba lta bu dag go// ser ba 'bab pa lta bu dag go// sbrul gdug pa lta bu dag go/ dgra
226b4(mdo sde): dang 'dra ba dag go/ dgon pa'i lam lta bu dag go// srin po'i grong lta bu dag go// gshed ma lta bu dag go// phyag dar lta bu dag go// 'dod pa rnams ni dur khrod lta bu dag tu shes shing /
226b5(mdo sde): 'dod pa la chags pa dang / 'dod pa la zhen pa dang / 'dod pa'i yongs su gdung ba dang / 'dod pa'i kun 'byung ba dang / 'dod pa rnams kyi nyes dmigs shes te/ de 'dod pa rnams la nyes
226b6(mdo sde): dmigs su shes pas skyo song / chos kyi bsam pa bsgoms pa dang / bslab pa 'dzin pa la mngon par dga' bas gnas par byed do// chos yongs su tshol ba dang / chos kyi kun dga'
226b7(mdo sde): la dga' bas dga' ba dang / chos kyi nor bsags pa dang / chos kyi sems rnam par dag pa dang chos kyi las dang yang dag par ldan pa dang chos la gzhol ba dag tu 'gyur ro//
227a1(mdo sde): de dag 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe chos rjes su dran zhing chos kyi ro'i rnam par smin pa chos kyis brlan pa'i sems kyis gnas pa de dag gang dang gang rnam par lta bar byed pa de dang der
227a2(mdo sde): phyogs thams cad na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i tshogs chen po'i 'khor dang bcas pa mthong bar 'gyur ro// chos thos par 'gyur ro//
227a3(mdo sde): de dag chos de thos pas kyang yid mchog tu rangs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la lta bar byed do// de dag 'chi ba'i dus byas nas/ ngan song spangs shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa ma yin pa
227a4(mdo sde): rnams su skye ba dag tu 'gyur ro// der de dag yon tan gyis phyug pa dang / dul ba dang / yang dag par sdom pa la mngon par dga' zhing / bsam gtan dang / mngon par shes pas rnam par
227a5(mdo sde): rol pa/ byang grol gyi bde ba phun sum tshogs pa byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen pos brgyan pa sems can thams cad yongs su smin par mdzad pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing yon tan
227a6(mdo sde): gyis rnam par brgyan pa rnams dang lhan cig 'phrad par 'gyur ro// der de dag dang lhan cig phrad pas de dag gi bag chags kyi nying mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams yongs su zad par 'gyur
