374a2(mdo sde): dus la bab bo// de nas de'i tshe lha'i yang lha sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'khor phal po che dang nam mkha' la 'phags te/ dri za'i rgyal po gtsug phud lwa ba la sogs pa dri za grangs med pa ni/ mdun na lha'i rol
374a3(mdo sde): mo sna tshogs byed/ mi 'am ci'i rgyal po yid 'ong la sogs pa mi 'am ci du ma ni steng nas mchod pa'i las byed cing / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la dbyangs dang kalha'i skang yid du 'ong bas bstod bzhin du/
374a4(mdo sde): 'khor de dag dang / mchod pa de dag drang bcas te/ ri brang ru ga la ba der gshegs so// gshegs nas lha'i yang lhan/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhengs bzhin du/ zhal brang phyogs su mtsho chen po yun ring po nas/
374a5(mdo sde): rgyamatsho ltar 'dug pa la gzigs te/ sku drang por bsrangs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin bye ba brgya phrag brgya stong du ma la snyoms par zhugs te/ bskal pa grangs med pa gsum nas/ bdag nyid kyi sangs
374a6(mdo sde): rgyas kyi spyod pa smon lam dang / bsod nams mngon du mdzad do// de nas de'i tshe lha'i yang lha sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ ri grang ru dang / yul dge ba dang / gser gyi dkyil 'khor nas/ srid pa'i rna mo
374a7(mdo sde): bar du byin gyis brlabs te/ bsrung ba dang / gtsang ba dang / bkra shis dang / mtshams gcad pa dang / bzlas brjod dang / yul dge bar mdzad do// de nas de'i tshe lha'i yang lha sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis
374b1(mdo sde): 'khor de dag thams cad la bka' stsal pa/ ri brang chu bcom ldan 'das kyi pho drang mchod rten gom sA la gan d+ha dang bcas/ yul dge ba dang bcas pa 'di ni/ bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi/
374b2(mdo sde): phyag macan dang / ma 'dres pa dang / thun mong ma yin pa dang / dben pa yin te/ rmya des na yul 'di ni dge ba zhes bya'o// de nas de'i tshe lha'i yang lha sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis yul dge ba dang / mabar dge
374b3(mdo sde): can dang / dge 'dun so so'i kun dga'ar ba dang / gtsug lag khang dang / dgon pa'i gnas dang / yul der so so nas bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dge ba byed par 'gyur ba'i rgyal po dang / chos dang ldan pa'i dad pa can
374b4(mdo sde): dang / sbyin bdag dang / li thams cad 'byung bar lung bstan to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis// byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyed rnams kyis kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'byung ba'i yul 'dir
374b5(mdo sde): ci nas kyang / sems can rnams dam pa chen po myur du thob par 'gyur ba dang / ting nge 'dzin 'grub par 'gyur bar byin gyis rlobs shig/ de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das/ mtsho rol nas cung zad cig thar bskyed de/ ro'i
374b6(mdo sde): song la ri thang ru'i steng du gangam bri bshams pa la skyil mo krung bcus te bzhugs nas/ zhal nub phyobs su bcom ldan 'das kyi po drang mchod rten gom sAl bran d+ha ba dre logs su gzigs so// de nas de'i tshe 'jig rten
374b7(mdo sde): gyi khams gzhan dang gzhan nas/ byang chub sems dpa' nyi khri mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa'i drang srong mang po dang thabs cig tu bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags so// lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi pho
375a1(mdo sde): brang mchod rten go ma sA la gan d+ha la yang phyag 'tshal skyabs su song / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa la yang phyag 'tshal skyabs su song nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//
375a2(mdo sde): de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor bal po che 'dus par mkhyen nas/ 'khor de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bskal pa bzang po 'di la sngonas sa rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhi byung ste/ de dag
375a3(mdo sde): gis kyang mchod rten go ma sA la gan d+ha yul dang bcas par byin gyis brlabs so// bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sangs rgyas stong rtsa gcig 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag thams cad kyang 'khor
375a4(mdo sde): dang bcas te 'dir gshegs nas/ mchod rten go ma sA la gAn d+ha yul dang bcas par byin gyis rlob cing / mtshams gcad pa dang / bkra shis pa dge bar mdzad par 'gyur ro// nga yang da ltar byin gyis rlob pa'i dus
375a5(mdo sde): la bab pas byin gyis rlob par mdzad do// de nas de'i tshe lha'i yang lha sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin da ltar gyi sangs rgyas mngon sum du bzhugs pa zhes bya ba dang / gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge
375a6(mdo sde): 'dzin grangs med pa la snyoms par zhugs so// de'i tshe ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa rnams dang / bsam gtan pa rnams yongs su skyong bar byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen gyis kyang / sangs rgyas 'od
375a7(mdo sde): srungs kyi mchod rten gyi drung du bzhugs te/ yul byung bar gyur pa'i tshe bdag gi gzugs brnyan byed par 'gyur bar sa gzhi de byin gyis brlabs so// de bzhin du smon lam chen pos gnas pa/ byang chub sems
375b1(mdo sde): dpa' 'ang ma dpal gnon nur gyur pas kyang / ri brang dul brlag lag pang spong byed ces bya ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i sa gni der / bsnyen pa byed pa rnams 'grub par 'gyur bar byin gyis brlabs so// de bzhin du num ma dar/
375b2(mdo sde): ltar stobs dpag tu med pa/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying pos kyang / gtsug lag khang 'jig tshogs spong byed ces bya ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i sa gzhi de mchod gnas su 'gyur bar byin gyis brlabs so// de
375b3(mdo sde): bzhin du thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa// byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis kyang / gtsug lag khang 'od can zhes bya ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i sa gzhi der dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur bar byin gyis
375b4(mdo sde): brlabs so// de bzhin du rtag tu byams pa dang ldan pa byang chub sems dpa' byams pas kyang / gtsug lag khang bi si mo nya zhes bya ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i sa gzhi der bdag nyid bzhugs par byin gyis brlabs so// de
375b5(mdo sde): bzhin du spyod pa shin tu rnam par dag pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying pos kyang / gtsug lag khang ye shes ri zhes bya ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i sa gzhi de phyag bya bar 'os par 'byung bar 'gyur bar byin gyis brlabs so//
375b6(mdo sde): de bzhin du gdul ba'i skye bo rnams grol bar mdzad pa la thags thogs mi mnga' ba/ byang chub sems dpa' sman gyi rgyal pos kyang / gtsug lag khang ba no tse zhes bya ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i sa gzhi der dngos grub 'a grub par byin/
375b7(mdo sde): gyis brlabs so// de bzhin du rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos kyang / gtsug lag khang dge 'dun skyong zhes bya ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i sa gzhi der dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur bar/
376a1(mdo sde): byin gyis brlabs so// de bzhin du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag dang / dgra bcom pa chen po rnams kyis kyang / li yul gang dang gang du gtsug lag
376a2(mdo sde): khang dang / skyed mos tshal dang / dgon pa'i gnas 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i sa gzhi thams cad/ dper na zla ba nya ba la skar ma'i tshogs rnams kyis yongs su bskor nas/ steng gi bar snang dag pa la rgyu ba bzhin du mdzes pa dang /
376a3(mdo sde): yid du 'ong ba dang / rgyas pa dang / dga' dga' ltar 'dug par byin gyis brlabs so// yang de'i tshe ri glang ru la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /
376a4(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa chen po rnams kyis 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs du ma bkye bas/ li yul thams cad snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so// de nas skad cig de nyid la mtsho chen po de'i nang nas pad+ma sum brgya lnga bcu rtsa
376a5(mdo sde): gsum byung bar gyur te/ pad+ma re re'i steng na yang / sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sku gzugs 'od dang bcas pa bzhugs pa snang bar gyur to// de nas de'i tshe lha rnams kyis sngon ma mthong ba'i mtshan ma
376a6(mdo sde): mthong nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu mtsho'i nang nas pad+ma sum brgya lnga bcu rtsa gsum sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i/
376a7(mdo sde): sku gzugs dang bcas te byung ba 'di ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ yul 'di 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i tshe/ yul 'di nyid du pad+ma ji snyed pa'i dgon pa'i gnas dang / gtsug lag khang na gaN+DI rdung bar 'gyur ba dang / gnas
376b1(mdo sde): gang dang gang du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / nyan thos chen po rnams 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs 'gyed cing / yul byin gyis brlabs pa'i sa gzhi de dag dang / de bzhin du ngas de bzhin gsheg/
376b2(mdo sde): pa'i pho brang mchod rten go ma sA la gan d+ha yul dge ba dang bcas pa byin gyis brlabs pa'i sa gzhi 'dir/ dad pa can gyi sbyin bdag rnams kyis so so nas sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i gzugs brnyan byed par 'gyur
376b3(mdo sde): zhing na gnas de dang de dag tu bsnyen pa byas na// ci dang ci 'dod pa 'grub par 'gyur ba'i snga ltas yin no// yang de'i tshe lha rnams stan las langs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
376b4(mdo sde): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das yul 'di dus ji tsam zhig na 'byung bar 'gyur ba/ su zhig gis 'byin par bgyid pa lags/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das da ltar ni dgon pa chab chen po'i gter lags na su zhig gis ji
376b5(mdo sde): ltar 'byin pa bka' stsal du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu nyon cig/ nga mya ngan las 'das nas lo brgya lon pa'i tshe/ rgyu'i yul du rgyal po che yang zhes bya ba bu stong rang bar bdog pa
376b6(mdo sde): zhig 'byung bar 'gyur te/ bu re re yang yul re reg sar du rol du bcug go// phyis nub phyogs logs na/ ri brang ru dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi pho brang mchod rten go ma sA la gan d+ha yod pa'i yul de bzhin gshegs pa du
376b7(mdo sde): mas byin gyis brlabs brlabs pa zhig yod do zhes thos nas/ 'di snyam du ma la bdag la bu gcig yod na/ sangs rgyas phal po ches byin gyis brlabs pa'i gnas der yul 'debs su gzhug go snyam du
377a1(mdo sde): bsams nas/ de'i tshe rgya'i rgyal pos rnam thos kyi bul bu gcig bslangs so// rnam thos kyi bus kyang 'dzam bu'i grong 'di na/ rgyal po mya ngan med ces bya ba'i bu zhig btsas pa byin te/
377a2(mdo sde): bu de ni gzugs bzang ba/ dbyibs mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa zhig yon no// bu de'i don du sa las nu ma zhig byung ba dang / bu de sngon gyi bsod nams dang dge ba'i rtsa ba'i mthus/ num de la nubar byed pas/ des na
377a3(mdo sde): bu de'i mangs las nu ma nu zhes bya'o// bu de myur bar skyes nas/ pha rgya'i rgyal pos rgyal srid kyi dbang ni bskur/ nor mang po ni byin/ blon po phal po che ni lus kyi rim gro par bskos nas/ rgyal po sa las nu ma nu de/
377a4(mdo sde): blon po chen 'dzang sho zhes bya ba la sogs pa dmag du ma dang lhan cig tu n+ya'i yul nas byung ste/ yul 'dir 'ong bar 'gyur ro// 'ongs nas 'dir yul 'debs par 'gyur te/ rgyal po sa las nu ma nu des yul btab pa'i
377a5(mdo sde): phyir/ rgyu des na yul 'di'i ming nis las nu ma nu'i yul zhes bya bar 'gyur ro// dus de'i tshen nub phyogs logs na rgya gar gyi mi phal po che 'dir 'ong bar 'gyur te/ rgyal po sa las nu ma nu'i 'bangs su mchid kyis
377a6(mdo sde): 'tshal zhing / chu srid gcig par num par 'gyur nas/ rgyu'i blon po chen po 'dzang sho la sogs pas rim gyis rgya dang / rgya gar gyi grong dang / grong khyer dang / zong rdal 'debs par 'gyur ro// de ltar rgyal po
377a7(mdo sde): sa las nu ma nu de/ mi rabs du ma'i bar du/ yul 'di'i rgyal po byed par 'gyur ro// rgyal po de rnams kyis kyang / rims gyis so so nas/ yul 'dir dgon pa'i gnas dang / gtsug lag khang byas nas/
377b1(mdo sde): rlung / 'bas dang / gal 'byed pa kyang 'jas cing / la lani bdag nyid kyang ra 'drung bar byed do// la lani ba dang mo rab tu 'byung bar byed do// la la nI 'dangs lus gas rad pa sa
377b2(mdo sde): 'byung bar gnang bar byed do// yul 'dir mi byang chub sems dpa'i rigs can mang po zhig byung ste/ rtag tu dkon mchog gsum las dge ba'i rna bsogs shing / bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po byed par
377b3(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// de ltar na yul 'di ni rgyal po sa nu ma nus yul gtong ba'i tshul de lta bus 'byung bar 'gyur ro// yul 'di ni sangs rgyas 'byung ba re re'i tshe yang 'byung zhing rgyas par 'gyur ro// ci'i phyir yul
377b4(mdo sde): gzhan dang gzhan dag ni zhig nas/ yun ring mo zhig tu stong zhing dgon par 'dug la/ yul dge ba ni sangs rgyas 'byung ba re re'i tshe mi rnams kyis brgyan cing mdzes par 'gyur zhe na/ 'di ltar yul 'di ni thub pa
377b5(mdo sde): drang srong chen po'i gnas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten go ma sA la gan d+ha zhes bya ba'i ri grang ru dang nye ba chu bo go ma'i 'gram na yod pa'i phyir ro// mchod rten 'di mdo sde'i nang nas ni/ ming go ma sA la gan d+ha
377b6(mdo sde): zhes bya'o// 'jig rten pal gyi tha snyad du ni chu bo go ma'i 'gram zhes bya bar 'dogs par 'gyur te/ 'di ltar ji srid du mchod rten chu bo go ma'i 'gram zhes bya ba dang / 'od srungs kyi mchod rten 'di gnyis rgyas
377b7(mdo sde): shing mchod gnas su byed pa de srid du ni/ yul dge ba zhes bya ba rgyas shing bzang por 'gyur ro// nam mchod rten 'di gnyis rgud pa de'i tshe/ yul yang rgud cing stongs par 'gyur ro// de nas de'i tshe 'khor
378a1(mdo sde): der 'dus pa'i lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'i gsung de thos nas/ mchod rten gomasA la gan d+hA dang / ri thang rul dad pa dang / gus pa chen po rnyed de/
378a2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la mgo bos phyag 'tshal skyabs su song nas/ spyan sngar 'di skad du bdag cag kyang dus de'i tshe yul 'dir rigs mthon por skyes nas/ bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa srung
378a3(mdo sde): zhing / yul chos kyi bka' khrims mi nyams par byed par gyur cig ces smon lam btab bo// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lha'i rgyal po rnam thos kyi bu dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
378a4(mdo sde): chen po 'du shes can zhes bya ba dang / lha mi pham pa zhes bya ba dang / klu'i rgyal po khyim tshig ces bya ba dang / lha nam mkha'i dbyings zhes bya ba dang / lha gser gyi 'phreng ba can zhes bya ba dang / lha mo lcags
378a5(mdo sde): kyu can zhes bya ba dang / lha mo gnas can zhes bya ba rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu khyed rnams la mchod rten go ma sA la gan d+ha dang / ri grang ru yul dang bcas pa dang / nga'i
378a6(mdo sde): bstan pa dang / sras rnams yongs su gtad kyis/ yongs su srung ba dang / sgrub pa dang / mchod gnas su 'gyur bar gyis shig/ yul 'dri'i rgyal po dang / yul 'dzin pa'i thon po dang / sbyin bdag
378a7(mdo sde): chos dang 'thun pa rnams kyang yongs su gtad kyis de bzhin du gyis shig/ ri grang ru lung bstan pa'i mdo 'di yongs su gtad kyis 'phel zhing rgyas par gyis shig/ gang gi tshe yul 'di me 'am/
378b1(mdo sde): chu'am/ pha rol gyi dmag gis nyen cing 'phongs par gyur na/ mdo 'di bklag pa dang / kha ton dang / mchod pa dang / bsam pa dang / bsgom pa byas nu/ de sta na yul de'i gnod pa zhi bar 'gyur ro// ma
378b2(mdo sde): 'ongs pa'i dus na sems can rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pas/ yul 'dir sum pa rnams dang / bod rnams 'ong bar 'gyur gyis/ de'i tshe mdo 'di lhogs shig dang / mdo 'di thos na mdo 'di'i mthu dang /
378b3(mdo sde): lha rnams kyi byin gyis sa// dad pa med pa de rnams yul 'jig par mi byed cing / yid kyang 'gyod par 'gyur ro// ma 'ongs pa'i dus na yul 'dir rgyu rnams kyang 'ong bar 'gyur gyis// de'i tshe mdo 'di lhogs shig
378b4(mdo sde): dang / mdo 'di thos nas de dag dad pa skye bar 'gyur ro// dang pa'i stobs kyis yul mi 'jig cing / phyir zhing bsrung ba dang / bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po yang byed par 'gyur te/ rgyu des ni mdo 'di ni yul la phan 'dogs
378b5(mdo sde): pabyed pa yin no// mdo 'dini pan yon gzhan yang mang du yod de/ yun zung ngus ni brjod par mi nus so// de'i phyir mdo 'di byed rnams la yos su gtad do// de na pa de'i chenam thos kyi bu la sogs pa lnga/
378b6(mdo sde): rnams dang / klu'i rgyal po dang / lha mo dag 'khor dang bcas te langs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar pus mo'i lhangs la btsugs te/ thal mo sbyar nas 'dri skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
378b7(mdo sde): bdag cag rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' spyi bos len par 'tshal lo// yang gsol pa'o/ ston pa bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad bka' stsal pa bzhin du mchod rten gom sA la gan d+ha dang / ri grang ru rul
379a1(mdo sde): dang bcas pa thams cad yongs su bsrung bar 'tshal/ bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa dang / chos dang 'thun pa'i rgyal po dang / rab tu 'byung ba dang / chos dang 'thun par yul 'dzin pa dang /
379a2(mdo sde): chos dang 'thun pa'i sbyin bdag dang / gang zhig bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po bgyid par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang yongs su bsrung bar ni 'tshal na/ bcom ldan 'das ji srid du yul 'dir dkon mchog gsum mchod//
379a3(mdo sde): gnas su bgyid pa dang / yul 'dzin pas kyang chos dang 'thun par yul skyong zhing / chos dang mi mthun pa'i sems can rnams kyi mgon mi bgyid pa de srid du/ bdag cag gis yongs su bsrung bar rngo thog ste/ mdo 'di
379a4(mdo sde): yang li yul du yun ring du gnas par bgyi ba'i srad du/ li yul nas nyi 'og tu gyur pa'i rgyal po dang / blon po rnams la mdo 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi li yul gyi ched du/ ri grang ru las bshad pa yin no zhes rnar
379a5(mdo sde): grags par bgyid/ sug par thob par bgyi/ sems bsgyur bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das nam yul 'dir dkon mchog gsum mchod gnas su mi bgyid cing / chos dang mi mthun pa rnams kyi mgon lhag par bgyid pa de'i
379a6(mdo sde): tshesems bskur ba bdag cag rnams kyi gzi brjid dang / mthu stobs nyams par 'gyur bas yul 'di'i ched dang bsrung bar ni Do mi thog go/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bdag cag rnams kyi mthu stobs dang / gzi brjod
379a7(mdo sde): ni bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa dang / chos dang 'thun par yul chos bzhin du skyong ba dang / bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dge ba'i rtsa ba'i mthus 'phel bar 'gyur ba lags so// de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom
379b1(mdo sde): ldan 'das gdan las bdengs nas/ ri grang ru'i steng gi 'gram nas mchod rten gom sA la gan d+ha gang na ba de logs su gzigs nas/ yang nas yang du de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul mchod rten gom sA la gan
379b2(mdo sde): d+ha dang / ri grang ru dang / yul dang bcas pa lan gnyis lan gsum gyi bar du byin gyis brlabs nas/ li yul thams cad dang / mtsho'i nang na gnas pa'i sems can grangs med pa rnams la 'od zer dang / thugs
379b3(mdo sde): rje chen pos khyab par mdzad de/ 'od zer de dang / thugs rje chen po des chur gnas pa'i sems can de dag thams cad sdug bsngal ni zhi bar gyur/ tho ba dang 'on du 'dzin pa dang ni thal te/ byams pa'i sems dang ldan
379b4(mdo sde): par gyur cing / lha'i bde ba dang ldan nas skad cig de nyid la/ sems can de dag las grangs med pa zhig tshe 'phos nas/ lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du skyes te/ sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur ba'i sa bon rnyed cing byang chub
379b5(mdo sde): las bIr mi ldog par gyur to// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lha rnams la lan gsum gyi bar du bos nas/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu khyed kyis dam bcus pa rnams ni brtson
379b6(mdo sde): 'grus med par mi 'grub bo// rigs kyi bu ngas bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyi bar du dka' ba spyad pa'i bstan pa 'di dang / mchod rten go ma sA la gan d+ha yul dang bcas pa khyed rnams la yongs su gtad kyis
379b7(mdo sde): yongs su srungs shig/ khyed rnams las gang zhig gis nga rjes su dran zhing gzungs yod pa dang / bstan pa bsrung ba des ni bstan pa 'di la rab tu byung ba rnams yongs su srung bar gyis shig/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mi
380a1(mdo sde): khyim pa la la zhig lo brgya'i bar du nyin re zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba bsod nams chen po byed la/ 'ga' zhig nyin gcig rab tu byung nas bstan pa la gnas na/ snga ma bas phyi ma'i bsod nams/
380a2(mdo sde): kyi brgya'i char yang mi chog go// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed thams cad kyang sngar khyim gyi gnas spangs te rab tu byung nas/ spyod lam de nyid kyis byang chub chen po brnyes so//
380a3(mdo sde): nga yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs te/ sa bcu brnyes nas srid pa tha ma'i tshe/ nam phyed nas rgyal po'i khab nas byung ste/ nags tshal du gshegs so// nags tshal nas bzhon pa rgyal po yab kyi thog
380a4(mdo sde): tu bkri nas/ rang gi sgra ral gris bregs te/ nga'i gos gya nom pa rin thang med pa rngon pa de dag las chos gos ngur smrig tu brjes so// ngas gos de gyon nas dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag
380a5(mdo sde): 'tshal skyabs su song nas/ rab tu byung ba'i spyod lam bzung ba dang / lha thams cad nga la phyag 'tshal/ skyabs su song nas phyi bzhin du 'brang ngo // nga yang spyod lam de nyid kyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
380a6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas brnyes so// de'i phyir bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa ni dam pa yin par shes par bya'o// rab tu byung ba ni bsod nams dang ldan par shes par bya'o// 'jig rten na rab tu byung bas thob pa ma
380a7(mdo sde): gtogs par khyim pa'i cha lugs kyis dgra bcom pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas sam/ bla na med pa'i byang chub 'thob pa ni sus kyang ma thos ma mthong ngo // rab tu byung ba'i spyod lam 'di ni 'jig rten na lha/
380b1(mdo sde): la sogs pa thams cad kyi mchod gnas yon no// de nas de'i tshe lha dang lha mo de dag thams cad stan las langs te/ dbyangs gcig tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom
380b2(mdo sde): ldan 'das bdag cag rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar bka' stsal pa bzhin 'tshal zhing / bsams bzhin du bka' las 'gul bar mi 'tshal lo// yul 'dir sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa dang
380b3(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul mchod rten dang bcas pa yang kun tu bsrung ba dang / bsgrub pa dang / rjes su gzung bar 'tshal gyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang / bag cag rnams la mthu btang du gsol/
380b4(mdo sde): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ma 'ongs pa'i rtsod pa'i dus na byin gyis brlabs brlabs pa'i yul 'dir dgra mang po dang / ma dad pa dang / phyir rgol ba bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa la dad pa'i khyad par
380b5(mdo sde): mi rnyed cing / bstan pa gzhig pa'i slad du brtson pa dag 'byung ba'i slad du'o// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis lha de dag la legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste/ skyes bu dam pa rnams legs so legs
380b6(mdo sde): so// ngas kyang yul 'di byin gyis brlabs zin to// byin gyis brlabs pa de nyid kyis mtshams gcad pa yang yin no// ma 'ongs pa rjod pa'i dus na/ yul 'di gzhom pa'i phyir/ sum pa'i dmag
380b7(mdo sde): phal po me dang / dru gu rus sna tshogs dang / hor dang / gzhan yang dad pa med pa dag 'ong bar 'gyur te/ de'i tshe yul gzhan dang gzhan dag nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyar byin gyis
381a1(mdo sde): brlabs pa dag yul 'dir gshegs nas/ yul gyi sa mtshams bsrung bar mdzad de/ bsod nams kyi stobs des na yul 'di gtan rlag par mi 'gyur ro// gzugs brnyan de dag
381a2(mdo sde): gi phyi bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' dang / lha dang / klu dang / mthu stobs dang ldan pa mang po dag 'ong zhing / yul du gnod pa rnams zlog par byed/ dgra rnams kyis yul ma choms par byed de/ dge ba can zhes bya
381a3(mdo sde): ba'i mkhar nas de bzhin gshegs pa bde ba'i 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i gzugs brnyan gshegs nas/ nub phyogs mkhar ku sheng du bzhugs shing / yul gyis mtshams srung bar 'gyur ro// byang phyogs yul
381a4(mdo sde): she na zha zhes bya bar de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan she na zha zhes bya ba sa'i 'og nas 'byung bar 'gyur zhing yul gyis mtshams srung bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan ki'u lang zhes
381a5(mdo sde): bya ba gshegs nas/ shar phyogs yul phye ma zhes bya ba'i mkhar du bzhugs shing yul gyis mtshams srung bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan phye se zhes bya bar gshegs nas/ byang phyogs kyi ri
381a6(mdo sde): glang ru la 'od srungs kyi mchod rten gyi drung du bzhugs shing / dge slong dgon pa pa rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed cing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa dang / yul gyis mtshams srung bar 'gyur ro// mkhar dge ba can
381a7(mdo sde): zhes bya ba'i nang na/ tshong dus kla sta 'di ze zhes bya bar de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan rgyal po'i pho brang gnas zhes bya bar bzhugs shing / mkhar dge ba yul dang bcas pa'i sa mtshams srung bar 'gyur ro//
381b1(mdo sde): sa gzhi'i bo nya zhes bya ba gang du rgyal po lo la zhes bya ba mkhar brtsigs pa'i gros byed par 'gyur ba der/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan nu gon pa na zhes bya ba bzhugs shing / mabar dge ba can zhes bya ba yul dang
381b2(mdo sde): bcas pa'i sa marnams srung bar 'gyur ro// gtsug lag lang din gyi zhes bya bar de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad kyi gzugs parnyan thor kong du byas pa gshegs par 'gyur te/ gzugs brnyan de ni 'jam bu'i gling
381b3(mdo sde): gi zor khong du byas pa/ thams cad kyi thog mar 'byung ba yin no// gzugs brnyan de li rnams kyis mtshan 'khor ba'i mar me mdzad ces bya bar 'dogs par 'gyur te/ de ni l-i yul gyi gzugs brnyan thor kong du byed pa/
381b4(mdo sde): thams cad kyi dper 'gyur zhing bde bar gshegs pa yul dang bcas pa yongs su srung bar 'gyur ro// gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mang gi gzugs brnyan yul 'di'i dbus su gshegs nas/ phyogs
381b5(mdo sde): bcu'i marnams gcod par mdzad de/ ji srid du de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan phyogs phyogs na bzhugs pa de dag mchod gnas su byed pa de srid du/ yul 'di rtag par mi 'gyur ro// yul 'di nas skyes pa'i
381b6(mdo sde): mi 'am/ yul gzhan nas skyes pa'i mi la la zhig de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan de dag la snying zag pa nas dad pa dang / gus pa dang / rab tu dang bar byed cing / 'di snyam du bde bar gshegs pa'i gzugs
381b7(mdo sde): brnyan 'di dag ni/ yul 'di bsrung ba'i slad du gshegs so snyam du yang sems na/ gzugs brnyan de dag kyang sangs rgyas bzhugs pa bzhin du don mdzad par 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gzugs de dag
382a1(mdo sde): dang 'dra bar dus gsum du thogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir ro// gzhan yang yul 'dir nga'i gzugs brnyan chen po shing rtas 'dren pa byas te/ mkhar
382a2(mdo sde): dge ba can zhes bya ba'i nang du bzhag nas mchod pa'i gnas chen por byed par 'gyur ro// de nas yul 'dir phyogs dang phyogs mtshams nas/ tshong dpon chen po rnams 'ong bar 'gyur zhing / gnod pa rnams kyang
382a3(mdo sde): zhi bar 'gyur ro// gzhan yang yul 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan nyis brgya rtsa brgyad 'od srungs kyi mchod rten dang bcas par 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag thams cad kyang cho'i 'phrul chen po ston cing sems
382a4(mdo sde): can rnams kyi sdig pa chen po yongs su sbyong ba dang / gnod pa sel ba mdzad par 'gyur ro// yul 'dir gnod pa dang / 'jigs pa dang / skrag pa 'ga' zhig byung na/ yul 'di'i ched du phyogs lngar sbyor ba byas
382a5(mdo sde): te/ rgyal po dang / blon po rnams yul 'dzin pa gang zhig 'jigs pa dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir/ bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa las bsod nams skye bar 'dod na/ gtsug lag khang cer ma zhes bya bar bsod
382a6(mdo sde): nams bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yul 'di'i mi rnams kyi dad pa yang dag pa'i lta ba ni dang po gtsug lag khang de nas skye bar 'gyur ro// nam zhig li'i rgyal po dang / blon po dang / yul 'dzin pa rnams la/
382a7(mdo sde): gnod pa rnam pa sna tshogs shig byung na/ ri glang ru la sngon yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang na bzhugs bzhugs pa'i sa gzhi de la bskor bar bya'o// yul 'di'i sems can rnams las mi dge ba
382b1(mdo sde): bshags par 'dod na/ mchod rten gom stsal gan d+ha'i gam du bshags par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mchod rten de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa bzhin du gang dag gis bskor ba'am/ me ton/
382b2(mdo sde): gams bdug pa 'am/ dbyangs sam/ rol mo'i sgras mchod pa byas na/ mtshams med pa lnga yang nyams dmas par 'gyur na gzhan lta spos kyang ci dgos/ yul 'di'i rgyal po dang / blon po dang / yul 'dzin
382b3(mdo sde): pa'am/ gang zhig brtul zhugs chen po'i sdom pa len par 'dod pa des/ ri brang ru gang la de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan phyi sa zhes bya ba dang / 'od srungs kyi mchod rten yod pa de'i dge 'dun la
382b4(mdo sde): mchod par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yul 'dir chos spyod pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang / tshul khrims yongs su dag pa ni/ de nas 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// yul 'di'i mi la la zhig chad pa chen po
382b5(mdo sde): zhig la thug na/ des ri glang ru la gnas pa'i 'phags pa'i dge 'dun la skyabs su 'gro ba byas te/ des na chad pa chen po de las thar bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gnas de na thar pa thob stong phrag
382b6(mdo sde): du ma'i mtha'i bar du gnas shing mi stongs pa'i phyir te/ chu des na ri grang ru dang / mchod rten go ma sA la gan d+ha yul dang bcas pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chang khru yin no// de nas de'i tshe phyogs
382b7(mdo sde): bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag nas byang chub sems dpa' nyi khri lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na bde logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ dbyangs gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
383a1(mdo sde): ldan 'das bdag cag rnams kyis kyang / thabs sna tshogs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa spyod lam dang / yul 'di yongs su bskyang bar bgyi/ bsrung bar bgyi zhing / ji srid du bde bar
383a2(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i bstan pa dang / dkon mchog gsum gnas shing / rgyal po dang / blon po la sogs pa/ mi tshul khrims dang ldan pa dad pa can dang / yul chos dang 'thun par bgyid pa mchis pa de srid du yongs su
383a3(mdo sde): mi gtang zhing / yul 'dir dus dus su spyod lam dang cha lugs ci dang / ji lta bus sems can mang po'i bsod nams chen po yongs su smin par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas nyid du sems bskyed par 'gyur ba dang /
383a4(mdo sde): bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas nyid las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i skye ba blangs pa'i slad du/ kha cig gis ni rgyal rigs yongs su gzung bar bgyi/ kha cig/
383a5(mdo sde): gis ni rab tu byung ba dang / khyim pa gzhan gyi cha lugs yongs su gzung bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu legs so legs so// rigs kyi bu khyed rnams kyis 'di ltar bskal pa bzang po'i
383a6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyod yul dang / yul 'di gang du sems can rnams sangs rgyas nyid las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur bar de lta bu chu gang thob cig/ yang de'i tshe lha rnam thos kyi bu zhes bya ba dang / mi 'pham pa zhes
383a7(mdo sde): bya ba la sogs pa lha thams cad kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das da ni byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis yul 'di srung ba'i slad du mthu bstang ba dang / bcom ldan 'das
383b1(mdo sde): kyi byin gyi rlabs dang / mthus bdag cag rnams kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul dang / byin gyis brlabs brlabs pa'i yul 'di kun tu bsrung zhing yal bar mi gtang ba'i srad du/ brtson 'grus chen por
383b2(mdo sde): shugs kyis 'bad par 'tshal lo// gal te yul 'dir dru gu la sogs pa gtum po dad pa ma mchis pa rnams dang / hor dang / sum pa'i dmagra dag mchi bar 'gyur na/ de dag phan tshun nang 'khrug 'byung ba dang /
383b3(mdo sde): de dag gi 'khor rlung mi mthun par 'gyur ba dang / 'gum par 'gyur bar bsti'o// yang na de dag ci nas kyang 'dir mi mami zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa 'jig mi nus par bzhi ba'i slad du/ gzhan gyi dbang
383b4(mdo sde): du 'gyur bar bgyi'o// bal te rgyu'i dmag dag mchis par gyur na/ de dag gi sems dad par bgyi zhing slar yul 'di la phan 'dogs pa dang / phyis yul 'dir bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po dge ba rgya chen po bgyid du
383b5(mdo sde): skul to// nam zhig yul 'di'i sems can rnams la gnod par bgyid pa de'i tshe na yang phyir dad par bgyi zhing mdo 'di yang khong du chud par bgyid du stsal to// gang gi tshe de dag ma 'ongs par dkon mchog gsum gyi lo
383b6(mdo sde): byad la dbang 'tshal zhing mdangs 'phrog pa dang / sems can bsod nams dang ldan pa rnams la 'tshe ba de'i tshe ni/ bdag cag gi 'khor gnod sbyin dad pa can dang / dad pa ma mchis pa du ma zhig dbang bskur te/
383b7(mdo sde): bkye nas yul der ci nas kyang yun ring mo zhig gi bar du rgud par bgyi zhing / yul 'di 'jig mi nus par bgyi ba'i slad ru/ mu ge dang / nad dang / pha rol gyi dmag mi mchi bar bgyid du stsal lo// li yul
384a1(mdo sde): gyi nor rdzas de dag gis 'tshal ba rnams kyang bkra mi shis par bgyi zhing / gang dang gang du phyin pa'i yul de thams cad du yang sman yon mi thogs shing 'khrug par bgyi'o// de dag
384a2(mdo sde): gi yul 'dzin pa dang dmag dpon yang rgud par bgyi'o// bod kyi dmag rnams la yang de bzhin du rig par bgyi ste/ gang gi tshe de dag chos dang 'thun par yul 'di 'dzin cing srung na ni/ bdag cag rnams kyis
384a3(mdo sde): kyang de dag yongs su bskyang zhing rgyal bar 'gyur bar bgyi'o// nam zhig bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa 'jig pa dang / yul gyi mi la gnod par bgyid pa de'i tshe na/ dmag rnams nang 'khrug 'byung ba dang / dmag
384a4(mdo sde): gi dpon yang tshe thung du rgud par bgyi ste/ rgyas par ni snga ma bzhin no// ma 'ongs pa'i dus na yul 'di'i rgyal po dang / blon po sems gya gru can/ bsod nams chung ba dang / dad pa med pa/ dkon mchog gsum
384a5(mdo sde): gyi dkor la 'jom nyas tu rlom zhing / yul gyi rtsis mgo dang 'gal bar bgyid pa/ nor rdzas ma brtags pas go 'phang 'tshol ba/ sems can bsod nams dang ldan pa rnams la sun 'byin du rgol ba/ ngo
384a6(mdo sde): med pa dang na 'dus can/ 'dod pa'i yon tan gyis ngoms mi myong ba/ rab tu byung ba dag gis sems skyo ba la la dag 'byung bar 'gyur na/ de dag ni bdag cag gis kyang yul 'di nas 'byung zhing yul ngan pa
384a7(mdo sde): gzhan dang gzhan dag tu sprugs par bgyis te/ tshul de lta bus yul 'di yongs su bskyang ba dang / bsrung bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das slad ma rtsod pa'i dus na/ yul 'di gzhig par brtson pa'i sems
384b1(mdo sde): can bdud kyi phyogs sdig pa bgyid pa/ mthu stobs dang ldan pa/ yul dag tu sems can rnams kyi dad pa zlog par bgyid pa/ sems gdug cing brlang ba/ lha dang / gru dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po/
384b2(mdo sde): dum zhig 'byung bar 'gyur la/ de dag kyang bdag cag gi dbang du mi 'gyur na/ de la bdag cag gis thabs ji ltar 'tshal/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod yid skyo bar ma
384b3(mdo sde): byed cig/ dri ci'i phyir zhe na/ gling bzhi pa 'di na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / lha mthu stobs che ba dang / klu dang gnod sbyin sa thob pa du ma zhig gnas pa de dag la/ sems 'jam pos mnod pa
384b4(mdo sde): chen po byas te/ mchod rten gom sA la gan d+ha dang / gtsug lag khang tsar ma la sogs pa yul byin gyis brlabs pa rnams su/ theg pa chen po'i sde snod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / 'dus
384b5(mdo sde): pa chen po dang / sangs rgyas phal po che dang / dkon mchog brtsegs pa la sogs pa shin tu rgyas pa'i sde mang po lhogs shig dang / yul so so nas byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu pa la sogs pa dang /
384b6(mdo sde): mthu stobs che ba'i sems can de dag yul 'dir 'ongs nas/ chos kyi ro mnos shing / dus gsum du gtogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dam tshig las mi 'gal bar byed/ bskal pa bzang
384b7(mdo sde): po'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod yul dang / yul yang srung bar byed/ yul 'di'i mi dang bstan pa yang srung bar byed par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ yul dge ba 'di'i rgyal po mthu
385a1(mdo sde): chung bar 'gyur te/ mthu chung ba des na rang gi mthu stobs kyis yul mi thub pas/ rgyal po dad pa can gzhan 'di lta ste/ bod kyi rgyal po dang / rgya'i rgyal po la sogs pa la skyabs/
385a2(mdo sde): btsal nas yul srung bar byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ rgya dang bod kyi yul du dkon mchog gsum gnas shing / mchod gnas chen por byed pa dang / yul de dag kyang byang chub
385a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po'i gnas su 'gyur zhing / sems can de dag kyang byang chub chen po'i lam tshol ba'i ngang tshul can/ theg pa chen po'i la dad pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gzhol bar 'gyur te/ de dag gi mthu/
385a4(mdo sde): stobs kyis li yul gyi mi dang / dkon mchog gsum rlag par mi 'gyur ro// skyes bu dam pa khyed rnams kyis kyang bod dang / rgya'i rgyal po dang / blon po dag ci nas kyang mchod rten go ma sA la gan d+ha/
385a5(mdo sde): dang / yul dge ba 'di la ri mo byed par 'gyur ba dang / yul 'di bsod rnams bya ba'i dngos po dge ba rgya chen po byed par 'gyur ba dang / yul 'di'i mi 'og dad pa med pa'i yul gzhan du 'khyams pa
385a6(mdo sde): rnams kyang sdug bsngal dang bral zhing bde bar rang gi yul du bskyal nas/ phyir yang dag pa'i lta ba can dang / bsod nams la dga' bar 'gyur bar sems sgyur cig dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba de'i stob
385a7(mdo sde): kyis/ skyes bu dam pa khyed rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / mdangs dang gzi brjid dang / 'khor 'phel bar 'gyur zhing sangs rgyas nyid du yang nye bar 'gyur gyis/ dus gsum du gtogs pa'i de
385b1(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi gdam ngag la byas pa gzo bar gyis shig/ 'di ltar yul 'di'i sems can rnams ni phyir mi ldog pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i las dang ldan pa/ snying rje dang ldan pa/ bden/
385b2(mdo sde): pa dang ldan pa/ gtong phod pa/ phrag dog dang lon du 'dzin pa rnam par spangs pa/ byas pa gzo ba/ chos la dga' ba/ yang dag pa'i lta ba can/ log pa'i lta ba thams cad rnam par spangs pa/ sems
385b3(mdo sde): 'jam par 'gyur te/ rgyu des na dge ba rnams zhes bya'o// yul 'di ma par yang mi byams pa dang / 'jam pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / mchod rten dang / gtsug lag khang du sems brgyan par 'gyur
385b4(mdo sde): te/ de'i phyir mkhar dge ba can zhes bya'o// gzhan yang yul gzhan dag nas/ sems can dad pa med pa/ snga 'khon du 'dzin pa dag yul 'dir 'ongs pa kun/ yul 'di'i rdul gyis reg cing / yul 'di
385b5(mdo sde): nas 'khrungs pa 'tsho ba la longs spyod na/ de dag thams cad kyi sems bsgyur na/ sems 'jam pa dang / byams pa'i bsam pa dang / khro ba dang / khon du 'dzin pa spangs pa dang / dad pa dang / yang yul
385b6(mdo sde): 'dir sdig pa mi byed par 'gyur te/ yul 'di ni yon tan 'di dag dang ldan pa yin no// de nas de'i tshe sngar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis lan gsum gyi bar du byin gyis brlabs nas/ 'od zer thugs
385b7(mdo sde): rje chen po dang bcas te bkye ba des/ mun gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyi sems yongs su dag pa dang / bde ba dang ldan par byas nas chu'i nang nas slar 'thon te/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi shing thams
386a1(mdo sde): cad du khyab par 'gyur to// yang 'od zer de dag slar log nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis yul byin gyis brlabs pa dang / nyan thos chen po rnams kyis yul byin
386a2(mdo sde): gyis brlabs pa dang / mtsho'i nang nas byung ba'i pad+mo'i steng na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan bzhugs pa de dang de dag gi 'od zer dang 'dres nas nam mkha' las 'phags te/ steng gi nam mkha'
386a3(mdo sde): khebs par gyur cing / li yul thams cad du lha'i me tog gi mar phab bo// lha'i me tog de dag phan tshun du reg pa las chos kyi sgo mo 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun gyi mtshan dang /
386a4(mdo sde): yang dag pa'i lta ba dang / shes rab dang / tshul khrims dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dka' ba spyad pa dang / smon lam dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul dang / sems
386a5(mdo sde): can yongs su smin par byed pa dang / dge sbyong gi 'bras bu bzhi po rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / khams gsum gyi srid pa las nges par 'byin pa
386a6(mdo sde): dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang / 'du byed 'jig pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / bsam gtan dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po dang / so so yang
386a7(mdo sde): dag par rig pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / dbang po yongs su dag pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs dang 'thun pa'i chos mtha' dag gi sgra 'byin par 'gyur ro// gzhan sems yongs su/
386b1(mdo sde): dag pa dang / byang chub kyi lan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lus dang / sdoms par 'dug pas dang stobs dang / drugs rje dang / byams pa chen po dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / the tsos sel pa/
386b2(mdo sde): dang / sangs rgyas nyid las mi ldog pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / mngon par rtogs pa dang / mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa dang / ma 'dzes pa dang / sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur ba dang / mi rtag pa dang
386b3(mdo sde): sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / stong pa dang / ma byas pa dang / ma skyes pa dang / phyin ci ma log pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po khongs su rtogs pa rnam par ma rtog/
386b4(mdo sde): pa'i ye shes rtogs pa dang / rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis so so rang gis rig pa'i spyod yul dang / skye ba sdug bsngal ba dang / rga ba dang / sdug pa dang bral ba dang / mi sdug pa dang phrad pa dang / 'dod pa'i
386b5(mdo sde): btsal te rnyed pa'i sdug bsngal gyi sgra yang 'byung bar gyur to// gzhan yang phung po lnga dag la sems can med pa dang / gso ba dang / gang zag dang / sog med pa dang / chos bden pa skye ba med pa dang / 'gag
386b6(mdo sde): ba med pa dang / rtag pa med pa/ chad pa med pa/ 'ong ba med pa/ 'gro ba med pa/ dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung dang / byin gyis brlabs dang / 'gro ba lnga po dag gi 'khrul pa rmi lam lta bu dang / 'khor ba'i
386b7(mdo sde): 'du byed btson ra lta bu dang / sbrum dang / smig rgyu dang / mu zla dang / brag cha lta bu zhes bya ba'i sgra byung bar gyur to// gzhan yang dad pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / dge ba bcu'i las
387a1(mdo sde): kyi lam dang / 'khor bas skyo bar gyur pa dang / de lta bu la sogs pa sgra brgya stong du ma byung bar gyur to// 'khor 'dus pa mang po de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' phyogs phyogs nas
387a2(mdo sde): lhags pa de dag thams cad sa la gnas pa'i lha dang / klu dang / nam mkha' la gnas pa'i lha dang / gnod sbyin thams cad sems ngo mtshar du gyur nas/ rangs pa skyes te/ chos kyi sgo mo'i sgra de dag la yid mi
387a3(mdo sde): byed par gyur to// de nas de'i tshe 'khor de dag gis khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
387a4(mdo sde): to// bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du cho 'phrul chen po 'di lta bu bstan pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal chos kyi sgo mo 'di dag ni/ yul dge ba nas
387a5(mdo sde): skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi ched de/ 'khor bzhi po rnams kyi ched du yang lhag par byin gyis brlabs nas bstan pa yin te/ chos kyi sgo mo 'dis ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams tshegs chung ngu dang / 'bad pa chung ngus/ dbang
387a6(mdo sde): po dang / shes pa yongs su dag par 'gyur zhing chos kyi sgo mo de dang de dag kyang mngon rtogs par 'gyur ro// ma 'ongs pa'i skye bo de dag ni byis pa chung yan chad chos mngon par rtogs par 'gyur zhing / rtsed mor yang chos kyi sgo mo 'di/
387a7(mdo sde): dag smra bar 'gyur ro// sems can de dag dbang po yongs su rtas nas/ chos kyi mig rnam par dag pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yang mthong bar 'gyur/ chos kyi rna ba rnam par dag pas/ chos yang dag pa ma nor ba yang thos
387b1(mdo sde): par 'gyur/ de dag 'khor ba nas 'du byed dang / chos thams cad las kyang sems rnam par grol bar gyur te/ sems de lta bu des na/ yul dgon pa byin gyis brlabs pa 'dir/ dge ba'i phyogs la brtson pa 'am/ yang
387b2(mdo sde): nA ri brang rul de dag thams cad dngos grub thob par gyur te/ bdud sdig can gyis kyang grags mi rnyed na/ gzhan dag gis lha smos kyang ci dgos/ 'di lta ste/ lha rnams kyis 'gror gnod sbyin nas/ dri ba'am/ mi'am
387b3(mdo sde): ci cad pas bcad par gyur na yang / mchod rten gom sA la gan d+ha dang / ri blang rul 'azas na/ de dag gis mi mthong bar 'gyur ro// brgyal mthong na yang sems zhi bar 'gyur te/ rgyu des na ri thung ru dang mchod rten gom sa
387b4(mdo sde): la gan d+ha ni/ mtshams gcad pa dang / gtsang byed dang / skyabs dang / 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag na gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyis kyang phyag bya bar 'os pa yin no// mchod rten gom sA la gran d+ha dang / ribra
387b5(mdo sde): ru dang / yul dge ba dang / mthar dge ba can dang / dgon pa byin gyis brlabs pa'i ming thos nas/ dad pa skyes pa tsam gyis kyang sdig pa chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa/
387b6(mdo sde): shA ri'i bu dang / rnam thos kyi bu la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyed gnyis song la/ mtsho chen po 'drir sha'i ri rdol te/ byang phyogs su gyi sho drang po'i nang du po la/ chu la gnas pa'i sems can rnams lnga/
387b7(mdo sde): mi gnod par srung ba dang / yul 'di mtshams mngon par gyis shig/ de nas nyan thos chen po shA ri'i bu dang / rnam thos kyi bus de bzhin 'tshal lo zhes gsol nas/ rdzu 'phrul gyis nam mkha' las sha'i
388a1(mdo sde): rig na bde logs su chas te/ shA ri'i bus ni lag nu 'bar gsil thogs/ rnam thos kyi bus ni lag na mdung thogs te/ shA ri'i phyed skam pas blangs te/ nub phyogs
388a2(mdo sde): logs su bzhag nas/ chu srol chen po gtod de/ mtsho srog chags dang chas kyi sho phung po'i nang du pho ste/ tshul de lta bas mchod rten gau ma sA la gan d+ha dang / ri glang ru dang / li yul de mngon par
388a3(mdo sde): byas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brgyad dang / byang chub sems
388a4(mdo sde): dpa' nyi khri drang srong dang bcas pa dang / rnam thos kyi bu dong / khyim tshig la sogs pa lha chen po brgyad/ 'khor sum khri lnga skyong lnga brgya dang bcas pa la/ mchod rten go ma sA la gan d+ha la
388a5(mdo sde): sogs pa yongs su gtad de/ lha de dag gis kyang de bzhin du mnos so// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang de bzhin du gnang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang
388a6(mdo sde): 'khor de dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la yi rangs te mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa ri grang ru lung bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen
388a7(mdo sde): po'i mdo rdzogs so// /
